sentences.en: I need to read the textbook for tomorrow's class.
sentences.zh: 我需要阅读明天上课用的课本。

sentences.en: The textbook has many useful examples and exercises.
sentences.zh: 这本课本有很多有用的例子和练习题。

sentences.en: We are having a conversation about our weekend plans.
sentences.zh: 我们正在就周末计划进行交谈。

sentences.en: A friendly conversation can help people understand each other better.
sentences.zh: 友好的交谈能帮助人们更好地相互理解。

sentences.en: Please read the story aloud.
sentences.zh: 请大声朗读这个故事。

sentences.en: She spoke aloud to make sure everyone could hear.
sentences.zh: 她大声说话以确保每个人都能听到。

sentences.en: Pronunciation is the way a word is spoken.
sentences.zh: 发音是一个单词的读法。

sentences.en: Listening to tapes can improve your pronunciation.
sentences.zh: 听磁带可以提高你的发音。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to make a sentence with the word 'happy'.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们用‘happy’这个词造句。

sentences.en: He received a long prison sentence for his crime.
sentences.zh: 他因犯罪被判处长期监禁。

sentences.en: The doctor is treating the patient.
sentences.zh: 医生正在治疗病人。

sentences.en: The nurse is taking care of the patient.
sentences.zh: 护士正在照顾病人。

sentences.en: Her expression showed she was happy.
sentences.zh: 她的表情表明她很高兴。

sentences.en: I can't read his expression clearly.
sentences.zh: 我不能清楚地读懂他的表情。

sentences.en: Scientists work hard to discover new things.
sentences.zh: 科学家们努力工作以发现新事物。

sentences.en: Children love to discover hidden treasures in the garden.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在花园里发现隐藏的宝藏。

sentences.en: She whispered a secret into his ear.
sentences.zh: 她在他耳边小声说了一个秘密。

sentences.en: Keeping secrets is important for trust.
sentences.zh: 保守秘密对建立信任很重要。

sentences.en: I need to look up the word in the dictionary.
sentences.zh: 我需要在字典里查阅这个单词。

sentences.en: She likes to look up information online.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在网上查找信息。

sentences.en: Learning grammar helps us write correctly.
sentences.zh: 学习语法帮助我们正确书写。

sentences.en: Good grammar makes communication clear.
sentences.zh: 良好的语法使交流清晰。

sentences.en: Please repeat the sentence after me.
sentences.zh: 请跟我重复这个句子。

sentences.en: I need you to repeat what I just said.
sentences.zh: 我需要你重复我刚刚说的话。

sentences.en: Please take a note of the important information.
sentences.zh: 请记录下重要的信息。

sentences.en: I need to write a note to remind myself of the meeting.
sentences.zh: 我需要写一张便条来提醒自己开会。

sentences.en: My pal and I play games together.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友和我一起玩游戏。

sentences.en: She is a kind pal who helps me often.
sentences.zh: 她是一个经常帮助我的善良朋友。

sentences.en: Physics is the study of matter, energy, and their interactions.
sentences.zh: 物理学是研究物质、能量及其相互作用的学科。

sentences.en: Learning physics helps us understand the laws that govern the natural world.
sentences.zh: 学习物理学帮助我们理解支配自然界的规律。

sentences.en: Chemistry is the study of matter and its properties.
sentences.zh: 化学是研究物质及其性质的学科。

sentences.en: In chemistry class, we learn about elements and chemical reactions.
sentences.zh: 在化学课上，我们学习元素和化学反应。

sentences.en: I need to memorize new English words every day.
sentences.zh: 我需要每天记忆新的英语单词。

sentences.en: It is important to memorize the key points of the lesson.
sentences.zh: 记忆课程的重点内容很重要。

sentences.en: Can you recognize the pattern in this sequence?
sentences.zh: 你能识别出这个序列中的模式吗？

sentences.en: The teacher explained the pattern of the grammar rule clearly.
sentences.zh: 老师清晰地解释了这条语法规则的模式。

sentences.en: Can you pronounce this English word correctly?
sentences.zh: 你能正确读出这个英语单词吗？

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to pronounce each syllable slowly.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们慢慢地读出每个音节。

sentences.en: Eating more fruits can increase your vitamin intake.
sentences.zh: 多吃水果可以增加你的维生素摄入量。

sentences.en: Regular exercise helps to increase physical strength.
sentences.zh: 规律锻炼有助于增强体力。

sentences.en: The car's speed is 60 kilometers per hour.
sentences.zh: 这辆车的速度是每小时60公里。

sentences.en: We need to measure the speed of the wind.
sentences.zh: 我们需要测量风的速度。

sentences.en: She is my business partner.
sentences.zh: 她是我的商业伙伴。

sentences.en: We work well as partners.
sentences.zh: 我们作为伙伴合作得很好。

sentences.en: She was born in a small town.
sentences.zh: 她出生在一个小镇。

sentences.en: When were you born?
sentences.zh: 你是什么时候出生的？

sentences.en: Some people seem to be born with a natural talent for music.
sentences.zh: 有些人似乎天生就有音乐天赋。

sentences.en: Dogs are born with a strong sense of smell that helps them explore the world.
sentences.zh: 狗天生具有敏锐的嗅觉，这帮助它们探索世界。

sentences.en: She has the ability to speak three languages.
sentences.zh: 她有说三种语言的能力。

sentences.en: Practice can improve your ability to solve problems.
sentences.zh: 练习可以提高你解决问题的能力。

sentences.en: I want to create a new story.
sentences.zh: 我想要创作一个新故事。

sentences.en: She can create beautiful paintings with her hands.
sentences.zh: 她能用双手创作美丽的画作。

sentences.en: The brain is the control center of the body.
sentences.zh: 大脑是身体的控制中心。

sentences.en: We use our brain to think and learn.
sentences.zh: 我们用大脑思考和学习。

sentences.en: She is active in class discussions.
sentences.zh: 她在课堂讨论中很积极。

sentences.en: An active lifestyle helps keep us healthy.
sentences.zh: 积极的生活方式有助于保持健康。

sentences.en: Please pay attention to the teacher in class.
sentences.zh: 课堂上请注意听老师讲课。

sentences.en: Attention, the exam will start in five minutes.
sentences.zh: 注意，考试将在五分钟后开始。

sentences.en: Please pay attention to the teacher in class.
sentences.zh: 请在课堂上注意听老师讲课。

sentences.en: You must pay attention to the traffic lights when crossing the road.
sentences.zh: 过马路时你必须注意交通信号灯。

sentences.en: I need to connect my phone to the Wi-Fi.
sentences.zh: 我需要把手机连接到 Wi-Fi。

sentences.en: Can you help me connect these two pipes?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我连接这两根管子吗？

sentences.en: I want to connect with my new classmates.
sentences.zh: 我想和我的新同学建立联系。

sentences.en: We can connect with friends through video calls.
sentences.zh: 我们可以通过视频通话与朋友联系。

sentences.en: I stayed overnight at my friend's house.
sentences.zh: 我在朋友家过夜了。

sentences.en: The package will be delivered overnight.
sentences.zh: 这个包裹将在一夜之间送达。

sentences.en: I need to write a review for the movie I watched yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我需要为昨天看的电影写一篇评论。

sentences.en: Her book review was published in the school magazine.
sentences.zh: 她的书评发表在了校刊上。

sentences.en: Knowledge is power.
sentences.zh: 知识就是力量。

sentences.en: She has a wide range of knowledge in different fields.
sentences.zh: 她在不同领域有广泛的知识。

sentences.en: Learning is a lifelong journey that never ends.
sentences.zh: 学习是一段永不停止的终身旅程。

sentences.en: We should develop lifelong habits to stay healthy and happy.
sentences.zh: 我们应该养成终身习惯以保持健康和快乐。

sentences.en: He wisely decided to study hard for the exam.
sentences.zh: 他明智地决定为考试努力学习。

sentences.en: She always spends her money wisely to save for the future.
sentences.zh: 她总是明智地花钱为未来储蓄。

sentences.en: Mooncake is a traditional Chinese pastry eaten during the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.zh: 月饼是中秋节期间食用的中国传统糕点。

sentences.en: My family likes to share mooncakes and admire the full moon on Mid-Autumn night.
sentences.zh: 我的家人喜欢在中秋夜分享月饼、赏月。

sentences.en: At night, we carry a lantern to light the way.
sentences.zh: 晚上，我们提着灯笼照亮道路。

sentences.en: The child hung a red lantern outside the door for the festival.
sentences.zh: 孩子为了过节在门外挂了一个红灯笼。

sentences.en: A stranger walked past me on the street.
sentences.zh: 一个陌生人在街上从我身边走过。

sentences.en: She felt nervous talking to a complete stranger.
sentences.zh: 和一个完全陌生的人说话，她感到紧张。

sentences.en: My aunt is my relative.
sentences.zh: 我的阿姨是我的亲戚。

sentences.en: He has many relatives in this city.
sentences.zh: 他在这个城市有很多亲戚。

sentences.en: I need to put on my coat before going out.
sentences.zh: 出门前我需要穿上外套。

sentences.en: She likes to put on a red dress for parties.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在派对上穿红色连衣裙。

sentences.en: A pound is a unit of weight in some countries.
sentences.zh: 磅是一些国家使用的重量单位。

sentences.en: She bought a pound of apples from the market.
sentences.zh: 她从市场买了一磅苹果。

sentences.en: Folk music is loved by many people around the world.
sentences.zh: 民间音乐受到世界各地许多人的喜爱。

sentences.en: We often learn about folk stories from our grandparents.
sentences.zh: 我们经常从祖父母那里听民间故事。

sentences.en: A goddess is a female god in mythology.
sentences.zh: 女神是神话中的女性神明。

sentences.en: Many ancient stories tell about the power of a goddess.
sentences.zh: 许多古老的故事讲述女神的力量。

sentences.en: Whoever arrives first can get a prize.
sentences.zh: 无论谁先到都能得到一份奖品。

sentences.en: I will help whoever needs assistance.
sentences.zh: 我会帮助任何需要帮助的人。

sentences.en: It is wrong to steal things from others.
sentences.zh: 从别人那里偷东西是不对的。

sentences.en: The thief tried to steal the money from the shop.
sentences.zh: 小偷试图从商店里偷走钱。

sentences.en: I lay the book on the table.
sentences.zh: 我把书放在桌子上。

sentences.en: She lay down to rest after work.
sentences.zh: 下班后她躺下休息了。

sentences.en: Please lay out the books on the table.
sentences.zh: 请把书摆放在桌子上。

sentences.en: The architect will lay out the plan for the new building.
sentences.zh: 建筑师将为新建筑规划布局。

sentences.en: I like to eat dessert after dinner.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢晚饭后吃甜点。

sentences.en: She made a delicious dessert for the party.
sentences.zh: 她为派对做了美味的甜点。

sentences.en: She grows flowers in her garden.
sentences.zh: 她在她的花园里种花。

sentences.en: We often play games in the garden.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在花园里玩游戏。

sentences.en: We should respect our tradition.
sentences.zh: 我们应该尊重我们的传统。

sentences.en: This festival is part of our tradition.
sentences.zh: 这个节日是我们传统的一部分。

sentences.en: I admire her courage and kindness.
sentences.zh: 我钦佩她的勇气和善良。

sentences.en: Many people admire the artist's great talent.
sentences.zh: 许多人钦佩这位艺术家的非凡才华。

sentences.en: I need to tie my shoes.
sentences.zh: 我需要系我的鞋带。

sentences.en: Can you help me tie this knot?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我系这个结吗？

sentences.en: They say the old mansion is haunted by ghosts.
sentences.zh: 据说那座古老的宅邸闹鬼。

sentences.en: She felt a haunted presence in the empty room.
sentences.zh: 她在空荡荡的房间里感到一种萦绕不去的存在。

sentences.en: A ghost is often described as a spirit of a dead person.
sentences.zh: 鬼魂通常被描述为死人的灵魂。

sentences.en: In stories, ghosts sometimes haunt old houses.
sentences.zh: 在故事中，鬼魂有时会出没于老房子。

sentences.en: The magician performed a clever trick.
sentences.zh: 魔术师表演了一个巧妙的把戏。

sentences.en: She learned a new trick to solve the math problem faster.
sentences.zh: 她学会了一个新技巧来更快地解决这道数学题。

sentences.en: The doctor will treat your illness.
sentences.zh: 医生会治疗你的疾病。

sentences.en: My mom likes to treat us to ice cream.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈喜欢请我们吃冰淇淋。

sentences.en: A spider has eight legs and spins webs to catch insects.
sentences.zh: 蜘蛛有八条腿，会结网捕捉昆虫。

sentences.en: I saw a small spider crawling on the wall in the corner.
sentences.zh: 我看见一只小蜘蛛在墙角的墙上爬。

sentences.en: Christmas is a popular holiday celebrated on December 25th.
sentences.zh: 圣诞节是12月25日庆祝的一个受欢迎的节日。

sentences.en: People often decorate Christmas trees and exchange gifts on Christmas.
sentences.zh: 人们通常在圣诞节装饰圣诞树并交换礼物。

sentences.en: He told a lie to his mother.
sentences.zh: 他对他妈妈撒了个谎。

sentences.en: It is wrong to lie to others.
sentences.zh: 对别人撒谎是不对的。

sentences.en: I enjoy reading a novel before bed.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢睡前读一本小说。

sentences.en: She is writing a novel about her childhood.
sentences.zh: 她正在写一本关于她童年的小说。

sentences.en: Eve is a girl's name.
sentences.zh: 伊芙是一个女孩的名字。

sentences.en: In the story, Eve lived in the garden.
sentences.zh: 在故事里，伊芙住在花园里。

sentences.en: The tree is dead after the long drought.
sentences.zh: 长时间干旱后，这棵树枯死了。

sentences.en: He felt dead tired after working all day.
sentences.zh: 工作了一整天后，他感到精疲力尽。

sentences.en: She is studying business at university.
sentences.zh: 她正在大学学习商业。

sentences.en: The company does business all over the world.
sentences.zh: 这家公司在世界各地做生意。

sentences.en: If you break the rules, the teacher will punish you.
sentences.zh: 如果你违反规则，老师会惩罚你。

sentences.en: The parent decided to punish the child for lying.
sentences.zh: 父母决定因孩子撒谎而惩罚他。

sentences.en: The sign on the wall says 'warn' to keep us safe.
sentences.zh: 墙上的标识写着'warn'来保证我们的安全。

sentences.en: Please remember the word 'warn' means to tell someone about possible danger.
sentences.zh: 请记住单词'warn'的意思是告诉某人可能存在的危险。

sentences.en: If you don't study hard, you may end up failing the exam.
sentences.zh: 如果你不努力学习，你最终可能会考试不及格。

sentences.en: We planned to go hiking, but we ended up staying at home because of the rain.
sentences.zh: 我们原计划去远足，但因为下雨最终只能待在家里。

sentences.en: I am present in the classroom now.
sentences.zh: 我现在在教室里。

sentences.en: She is present at the meeting today.
sentences.zh: 她今天出席了会议。

sentences.en: The sun's warmth makes me feel happy.
sentences.zh: 太阳的温暖让我感到开心。

sentences.en: A cup of hot tea brings warmth on a cold day.
sentences.zh: 一杯热茶在寒冷的日子带来温暖。

sentences.en: The fire began to spread quickly through the dry grass.
sentences.zh: 大火开始迅速蔓延过干草。

sentences.en: She spread the jam evenly on the toast.
sentences.zh: 她把果酱均匀地涂在吐司上。

sentences.en: I need to find the restroom before the meeting starts.
sentences.zh: 开会前我需要找到洗手间。

sentences.en: The restroom is on the first floor near the elevator.
sentences.zh: 洗手间在一楼电梯附近。

sentences.en: I need to stamp the document with the official seal.
sentences.zh: 我需要在文件上盖公章。

sentences.en: She used a stamp to mark the date on the envelope.
sentences.zh: 她用邮票在信封上标记了日期。

sentences.en: I bought a novel from the bookstore yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天从书店买了一本小说。

sentences.en: The bookstore on Main Street has a wide selection of children's books.
sentences.zh: 主街上的书店有各种各样的儿童书籍。

sentences.en: She sat beside me on the bench.
sentences.zh: 她在长椅上坐在我旁边。

sentences.en: The cat slept beside the warm fireplace.
sentences.zh: 猫在温暖的壁炉旁睡觉。

sentences.en: I sent a postcard to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我给我的朋友寄了一张明信片。

sentences.en: The postcard has a beautiful picture of the beach.
sentences.zh: 这张明信片上有一张美丽的海滩照片。

sentences.en: Pardon me, I didn't hear what you said clearly.
sentences.zh: 请再说一遍，我没听清你说的话。

sentences.en: If you don't understand, you can say 'pardon' to ask for repetition.
sentences.zh: 如果你没听懂，可以说“pardon”请求重复。

sentences.en: I need to go to the washroom before the class starts.
sentences.zh: 上课前我需要去一下洗手间。

sentences.en: The washroom is on the first floor of the building.
sentences.zh: 洗手间在这栋楼的一楼。

sentences.en: I need to go to the bathroom.
sentences.zh: 我需要去洗手间。

sentences.en: The bathroom is next to the bedroom.
sentences.zh: 洗手间在卧室旁边。

sentences.en: I normally get up at 7 o'clock in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我通常早上七点起床。

sentences.en: She normally walks to school instead of taking the bus.
sentences.zh: 她通常步行上学而不是坐公交车。

sentences.en: We must rush to catch the bus.
sentences.zh: 我们必须赶紧去赶公交车。

sentences.en: There's no need to rush; we have plenty of time.
sentences.zh: 没必要匆忙，我们有足够的时间。

sentences.en: My teacher will suggest a good book to read.
sentences.zh: 我的老师会推荐一本好书来读。

sentences.en: Can you suggest a way to solve this problem?
sentences.zh: 你能提出一个解决这个问题的方法吗？

sentences.en: We often pass by the park on our way to school.
sentences.zh: 我们上学路上经常路过公园。

sentences.en: Did you pass by the grocery store this morning?
sentences.zh: 你今天早上路过杂货店了吗？

sentences.en: The staff are working hard.
sentences.zh: 员工们正在努力工作。

sentences.en: Our school has many staff.
sentences.zh: 我们学校有很多员工。

sentences.en: A grape is a small, round fruit that grows in bunches.
sentences.zh: 葡萄是一种小而圆的水果，成串生长。

sentences.en: I like to eat sweet grapes as a healthy snack.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢把甜葡萄当作健康的零食来吃。

sentences.en: The central park is a popular place for people to relax.
sentences.zh: 中央公园是人们放松的热门地方。

sentences.en: The central idea of the story is about friendship.
sentences.zh: 这个故事的中心思想是关于友谊的。

sentences.en: There is a park nearby our school.
sentences.zh: 我们学校附近有一个公园。

sentences.en: She lives in a house nearby the river.
sentences.zh: 她住在河边附近的一所房子里。

zh: 抱歉，对不起；什么，请再说一遍

sentences.en: Pardon me, could you repeat that, please?
sentences.zh: 抱歉，你能重复一遍吗？

sentences.en: I didn't hear you clearly, so I said 'pardon me'.
sentences.zh: 我没听清你说的话，所以我说了“抱歉”。

sentences.en: I sent an email to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我给我的朋友发了一封邮件。

sentences.en: She checks her mail every morning.
sentences.zh: 她每天早上查看她的邮件。

sentences.en: The sun rises in the east.
sentences.zh: 太阳从东方升起。

sentences.en: We traveled east to the mountains.
sentences.zh: 我们向东旅行去了山区。

sentences.en: The scientist shared a fascinating story about space exploration.
sentences.zh: 这位科学家分享了一个关于太空探索的迷人故事。

sentences.en: Her fascinating paintings always attract many visitors to the gallery.
sentences.zh: 她那些迷人的画作总是吸引许多参观者来到画廊。

sentences.en: This store sells inexpensive clothes.
sentences.zh: 这家商店出售便宜的衣服。

sentences.en: We found an inexpensive hotel for our trip.
sentences.zh: 我们为旅行找到了一家便宜的酒店。

sentences.en: The park is uncrowded on weekday mornings.
sentences.zh: 工作日的早上公园不拥挤。

sentences.en: We prefer uncrowded beaches for our vacation.
sentences.zh: 我们度假时更喜欢人少的海滩。

sentences.en: It is convenient to take the bus to school.
sentences.zh: 乘公交车上学很方便。

sentences.en: Online shopping is convenient for busy people.
sentences.zh: 网上购物对忙碌的人来说很方便。

sentences.en: We went shopping at the mall yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天去商场购物了。

sentences.en: The new mall has many interesting stores.
sentences.zh: 这家新商场有很多有趣的商店。

sentences.en: The clerk helps customers at the store.
sentences.zh: 这位职员在商店里帮助顾客。

sentences.en: My friend works as a clerk in an office.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友在办公室里当职员。

sentences.en: The cat is sitting in the corner of the room.
sentences.zh: 猫正坐在房间的角落里。

sentences.en: Turn left at the next corner and you will see the park.
sentences.zh: 在下一个拐角处左转，你就会看到公园。

sentences.en: She asked politely if she could borrow a pen.
sentences.zh: 她礼貌地询问是否可以借一支笔。

sentences.en: He always speaks politely to his teachers.
sentences.zh: 他总是礼貌地和他的老师们说话。

sentences.en: I need to make a request to borrow a book.
sentences.zh: 我需要提出借一本书的请求。

sentences.en: Her request for help was quickly answered.
sentences.zh: 她寻求帮助的请求很快得到了回应。

sentences.en: Can you tell me the direction to the park?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我去公园的方向吗？

sentences.en: The sign shows the direction we should go.
sentences.zh: 这个指示牌显示了我们应该走的方向。

sentences.en: Her answer is correct.
sentences.zh: 她的答案是正确的。

sentences.en: Make sure your spelling is correct.
sentences.zh: 确保你的拼写是正确的。

sentences.en: It is polite to say 'thank you' when someone helps you.
sentences.zh: 当有人帮助你时，说“谢谢”是有礼貌的。

sentences.en: She always speaks in a polite manner to everyone around her.
sentences.zh: 她对周围的每个人说话总是很有礼貌。

sentences.en: She gave me a direct answer.
sentences.zh: 她给了我一个直接的答案。

sentences.en: The direct flight to Paris is very convenient.
sentences.zh: 飞往巴黎的直飞航班非常方便。

zh: 讲（某种语言）的人；发言者

sentences.en: The speaker is giving a speech on stage.
sentences.zh: 演讲者正在台上发表演讲。

sentences.en: We need to listen carefully to the speaker.
sentences.zh: 我们需要认真听演讲者讲话。

sentences.en: Whom did you meet at the party?
sentences.zh: 你在聚会上遇到了谁？

sentences.en: To whom should I send this letter?
sentences.zh: 我应该把这封信寄给谁？

sentences.en: It is impolite to interrupt others when they are speaking.
sentences.zh: 在别人说话时打断他们是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: Her impolite remarks made everyone in the room uncomfortable.
sentences.zh: 她不礼貌的言论让房间里的每个人都感到不舒服。

sentences.en: What's your address?
sentences.zh: 你的地址是什么？

sentences.en: I need to write down the address.
sentences.zh: 我需要写下这个地址。

sentences.en: I take the underground to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天乘地铁去上学。

sentences.en: The underground station is near my home.
sentences.zh: 地铁站在我家附近。

sentences.en: I parked my car in the parking lot.
sentences.zh: 我把车停在了停车场。

sentences.en: The parking lot is full of cars today.
sentences.zh: 今天停车场停满了车。

sentences.en: I need to study this course carefully.
sentences.zh: 我需要认真学习这门课程。

sentences.en: The course covers many interesting topics.
sentences.zh: 这门课程包含许多有趣的主题。

zh: 有幽默感的；滑稽有趣的

sentences.en: The comedian told a humorous story that made everyone laugh.
sentences.zh: 这位喜剧演员讲了一个幽默的故事，逗得大家都笑了。

sentences.en: Her humorous remarks always lighten up the atmosphere in the office.
sentences.zh: 她幽默的话语总能让办公室的气氛轻松起来。

sentences.en: The library is usually silent in the morning.
sentences.zh: 图书馆在早上通常很安静。

sentences.en: She remained silent during the meeting.
sentences.zh: 她在会议期间保持沉默。

sentences.en: The teacher's helpful advice made the problem easier.
sentences.zh: 老师有用的建议让问题变得简单了。

sentences.en: She is always helpful when her friends need assistance.
sentences.zh: 当朋友们需要帮助时，她总是乐于助人。

sentences.en: She visits her grandparents from time to time.
sentences.zh: 她偶尔去看望她的祖父母。

sentences.en: It rains from time to time in this season.
sentences.zh: 这个季节偶尔会下雨。

sentences.en: The teacher will score our exams tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 老师明天会给我们的考试打分。

sentences.en: My score in math improved this semester.
sentences.zh: 我这学期的数学成绩提高了。

sentences.en: The background of the story sets the scene for the main events.
sentences.zh: 故事的背景为主要事件设定了场景。

sentences.en: She painted the background of the picture with soft blue colors.
sentences.zh: 她用柔和的蓝色颜料绘制了这幅画的背景。

sentences.en: I need to prepare for the job interview.
sentences.zh: 我需要为求职面试做准备。

sentences.en: The interview will be held in the conference room.
sentences.zh: 面试将在会议室举行。

sentences.en: She is Asian and comes from China.
sentences.zh: 她是亚洲人，来自中国。

sentences.en: Asian culture is rich and diverse.
sentences.zh: 亚洲文化丰富多样。

sentences.en: We made a deal to meet at the park.
sentences.zh: 我们达成协议在公园见面。

sentences.en: She closed the deal with a smile.
sentences.zh: 她微笑着完成了这笔交易。

sentences.en: We need to deal with this problem immediately.
sentences.zh: 我们需要立即处理这个问题。

sentences.en: She knows how to deal with difficult customers.
sentences.zh: 她知道如何应对难缠的顾客。

sentences.en: Her shyness made it hard for her to speak in public.
sentences.zh: 她的羞怯使她很难在公众场合讲话。

sentences.en: With time, he overcame his shyness and made many friends.
sentences.zh: 随着时间的推移，他克服了羞怯，交了很多朋友。

sentences.en: I dare to try new things.
sentences.zh: 我敢于尝试新事物。

sentences.en: She didn't dare to speak in front of the class.
sentences.zh: 她不敢在全班面前说话。

sentences.en: A large crowd gathered in the square for the festival.
sentences.zh: 一大群人聚集在广场上参加节日活动。

sentences.en: The crowd cheered loudly when the team scored a goal.
sentences.zh: 当球队进球时，人群大声欢呼。

sentences.en: A ton is a unit of weight equal to 1000 kilograms.
sentences.zh: 吨是一个等于1000千克的重量单位。

sentences.en: This truck can carry a load of five tons.
sentences.zh: 这辆卡车能装载五吨货物。

sentences.en: This is a private conversation. Please don't share it with others.
sentences.zh: 这是私人对话，请不要与他人分享。

sentences.en: He prefers to keep his personal life private.
sentences.zh: 他更愿意保持个人生活的私密性。

sentences.en: The guard keeps the building safe.
sentences.zh: 保安保护大楼的安全。

sentences.en: We need a guard to watch the gate.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一名守卫来看守大门。

sentences.en: We require students to finish homework on time.
sentences.zh: 我们要求学生按时完成作业。

sentences.en: This job may require some special skills.
sentences.zh: 这份工作可能需要一些特殊技能。

sentences.en: European countries are known for their rich history and culture.
sentences.zh: 欧洲国家以其丰富的历史和文化而闻名。

sentences.en: She dreams of traveling to European cities like Paris and Rome.
sentences.zh: 她梦想去巴黎和罗马等欧洲城市旅行。

sentences.en: She has many African friends.
sentences.zh: 她有很多非洲朋友。

sentences.en: African culture is very colorful.
sentences.zh: 非洲文化非常丰富多彩。

sentences.en: She is British and loves drinking tea.
sentences.zh: 她是英国人，喜欢喝茶。

sentences.en: British culture has a long history of monarchy.
sentences.zh: 英国文化有着悠久的君主制历史。

sentences.en: She gave a speech at the conference yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天在会议上发表了演讲。

sentences.en: Listening to a good speech can inspire people.
sentences.zh: 听一场好的演讲能鼓舞人心。

sentences.en: This park is open to the public.
sentences.zh: 这个公园对公众开放。

sentences.en: The public has the right to know the truth.
sentences.zh: 公众有权知道真相。

sentences.en: It's not polite to speak loudly in public.
sentences.zh: 在公共场合大声说话是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: She prefers to avoid discussing personal matters in public.
sentences.zh: 她不喜欢在公共场合讨论私事。

sentences.en: An ant is a small insect that lives in groups.
sentences.zh: 蚂蚁是一种群居的小昆虫。

sentences.en: The ant is carrying a piece of food to its nest.
sentences.zh: 这只蚂蚁正把一块食物搬回巢穴。

sentences.en: An insect has six legs and three body parts.
sentences.zh: 昆虫有六条腿和三个身体部分。

sentences.en: Butterflies and bees are common types of insects.
sentences.zh: 蝴蝶和蜜蜂是常见的昆虫种类。

sentences.en: She seldom eats fast food because she wants to stay healthy.
sentences.zh: 她很少吃快餐，因为她想保持健康。

sentences.en: My grandparents seldom use smartphones, so they prefer calling instead of texting.
sentences.zh: 我的祖父母很少使用智能手机，所以他们更喜欢打电话而不是发短信。

sentences.en: Parents have a great influence on their children's behavior.
sentences.zh: 父母对孩子的行为有很大影响。

sentences.en: Her positive attitude has influenced many people around her.
sentences.zh: 她积极的态度影响了周围很多人。

sentences.en: She was absent from school yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天没来上学。

sentences.en: His absence made the meeting less effective.
sentences.zh: 他的缺席使会议效果变差了。

sentences.en: If you don't study hard, you may fail the exam.
sentences.zh: 如果你不努力学习，你可能会考试不及格。

sentences.en: He tried his best, but still didn't fail to finish the task on time.
sentences.zh: 他尽了最大努力，但还是没能按时完成任务。

sentences.en: We need to prepare for the final examination carefully.
sentences.zh: 我们需要认真准备期末考试。

sentences.en: The doctor will give him a thorough examination tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 医生明天会给他做一次全面检查。

sentences.en: She studies at a boarding school far from her home.
sentences.zh: 她在一所离家很远的寄宿学校学习。

sentences.en: Boarding school students usually live on campus during weekdays.
sentences.zh: 寄宿学校的学生通常在工作日住在校园里。

sentences.en: Students need to attend the class in person.
sentences.zh: 学生们需要亲自上课。

sentences.en: The teacher prefers to meet students in person.
sentences.zh: 这位老师更喜欢亲自见学生。

sentences.en: Tell me exactly what happened.
sentences.zh: 确切地告诉我发生了什么事。

sentences.en: The two answers are exactly the same.
sentences.zh: 这两个答案完全一样。

sentences.en: Pride can make people blind to their own mistakes.
sentences.zh: 骄傲会使人对自己的错误视而不见。

sentences.en: She takes great pride in her children's achievements.
sentences.zh: 她为孩子们的成就感到无比骄傲。

sentences.en: We take pride in our school's achievements.
sentences.zh: 我们为学校的成就感到自豪。

sentences.en: She takes pride in her ability to speak three languages.
sentences.zh: 她为自己会说三种语言的能力感到自豪。

syllables:
proud

（注：根据柯林斯词典及英语发音规则，"proud" 为单音节词，音标 /praʊd/ 对应一个音节，因此无需分割。）

sentences.en: She is proud of her achievements.
sentences.zh: 她为自己的成就感到自豪。

sentences.en: He feels proud when he helps others.
sentences.zh: 当他帮助别人时，他感到自豪。

sentences.en: Parents are proud of their children's achievements.
sentences.zh: 父母为孩子们的成就感到骄傲。

sentences.en: We should be proud of our country's culture.
sentences.zh: 我们应该为我们国家的文化感到骄傲。

sentences.en: The general led the army to victory.
sentences.zh: 这位将军带领军队取得了胜利。

sentences.en: In general, exercise is good for health.
sentences.zh: 通常来说，锻炼对健康有益。

sentences.en: The introduction of the book gives an overview of its main themes.
sentences.zh: 这本书的引言概述了其主要主题。

sentences.en: She made a brief introduction before starting her presentation.
sentences.zh: 她在开始演讲前做了简要的介绍。

sentences.en: Chinese people often use chopsticks to eat.
sentences.zh: 中国人经常用筷子吃饭。

sentences.en: Can you pass me the chopsticks, please?
sentences.zh: 请把筷子递给我好吗？

sentences.en: I found a shiny coin on the street.
sentences.zh: 我在街上发现了一枚闪亮的硬币。

sentences.en: Can you give me a coin for the vending machine?
sentences.zh: 你能给我一枚硬币买自动售货机里的东西吗？

sentences.en: You can use a fork to eat noodles.
sentences.zh: 你可以用叉子吃面条。

sentences.en: The fork is on the table next to the plate.
sentences.zh: 叉子在盘子旁边的桌子上。

sentences.en: She wore a blue blouse to the party.
sentences.zh: 她穿了一件蓝色衬衫去参加派对。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new blouse for school.
sentences.zh: 妈妈给我买了一件新衬衫上学穿。

sentences.en: Silver is a shiny, grayish-white metal often used in jewelry.
sentences.zh: 银是一种 shiny 的灰白色金属，常用于珠宝制作。

sentences.en: The moon's surface sometimes looks silver in the night sky.
sentences.zh: 月球表面在夜空中有时看起来是银色的。

sentences.en: The window is made of glass.
sentences.zh: 窗户是由玻璃制成的。

sentences.en: She drank water from a glass.
sentences.zh: 她用玻璃杯喝水。

sentences.en: Cotton is a soft fabric used to make clothes.
sentences.zh: 棉花是一种用于制作衣服的柔软布料。

sentences.en: Farmers grow cotton in warm climates around the world.
sentences.zh: 农民在世界各地温暖的气候中种植棉花。

sentences.en: Steel is a strong metal used to make cars and buildings.
sentences.zh: 钢是一种坚固的金属，用于制造汽车和建筑物。

sentences.en: We can use steel to build bridges because it is very tough.
sentences.zh: 我们可以用钢来建造桥梁，因为它非常坚固。

sentences.en: It's important to be fair to everyone.
sentences.zh: 对每个人公平是很重要的。

sentences.en: The teacher gave a fair grade to each student.
sentences.zh: 老师给每个学生打了公平的分数。

zh: 自然环境的；有关环境的

sentences.en: We should protect the environmental resources around us.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护我们周围的环境资源。

sentences.en: The environmental problem is becoming more and more serious.
sentences.zh: 环境问题变得越来越严重。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard is green.
sentences.zh: 院子里的草是绿色的。

sentences.en: Cows like to eat fresh grass.
sentences.zh: 奶牛喜欢吃新鲜的草。

sentences.en: The leaf is green and falls in autumn.
sentences.zh: 树叶是绿色的，在秋天落下。

sentences.en: I picked up a beautiful leaf from the ground.
sentences.zh: 我从地上捡起一片漂亮的树叶。

sentences.en: Farmers grow fresh produce like vegetables and fruits.
sentences.zh: 农民种植像蔬菜和水果这样的新鲜农产品。

sentences.en: We need to buy some produce from the market today.
sentences.zh: 我们今天需要从市场买一些农产品。

sentences.en: English is widely spoken around the world.
sentences.zh: 英语在全世界被广泛使用。

sentences.en: This book is widely read by students.
sentences.zh: 这本书被学生们广泛阅读。

sentences.en: Paris is known for the Eiffel Tower.
sentences.zh: 巴黎以埃菲尔铁塔闻名。

sentences.en: She is known for her beautiful singing voice.
sentences.zh: 她以优美的歌声闻名。

sentences.en: We need to follow the process step by step.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一步一步地遵循这个流程。

sentences.en: The cooking process involves mixing, baking and cooling.
sentences.zh: 烹饪过程包括混合、烘焙和冷却。

sentences.en: I need to pack my suitcase for the trip.
sentences.zh: 我需要为旅行收拾我的行李箱。

sentences.en: She will pack some snacks for the picnic.
sentences.zh: 她会为野餐打包一些零食。

sentences.en: A product is something made to be sold.
sentences.zh: 产品是被制造出来用于销售的东西。

sentences.en: She bought a new product from the store.
sentences.zh: 她从商店买了一个新产品。

sentences.en: No matter what happens, I will always be there for you.
sentences.zh: 无论发生什么，我都会一直在你身边。

sentences.en: You can choose any book, no matter which one you like.
sentences.zh: 你可以选择任何一本书，无论你喜欢哪一本。

sentences.en: She prefers local food when traveling.
sentences.zh: 她旅行时更喜欢当地食物。

sentences.en: The local park is a popular place for families.
sentences.zh: 这个当地公园是家庭聚会的热门地点。

sentences.en: This phone is a famous brand.
sentences.zh: 这部手机是一个著名的品牌。

sentences.en: She likes to buy products of this brand.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢购买这个品牌的产品。

sentences.en: You should avoid eating too much junk food.
sentences.zh: 你应该避免吃太多垃圾食品。

sentences.en: We need to avoid making the same mistake again.
sentences.zh: 我们需要避免再次犯同样的错误。

sentences.en: She carried a stylish handbag to the party.
sentences.zh: 她带着一个时尚的手提包去参加派对。

sentences.en: My mother bought a new handbag last week.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈上周买了一个新手提包。

sentences.en: I use my mobile to call my friends.
sentences.zh: 我用我的手机给朋友打电话。

sentences.en: My mobile can connect to the internet.
sentences.zh: 我的手机可以连接互联网。

sentences.en: I brush my teeth everyday.
sentences.zh: 我每天刷牙。

sentences.en: She goes to school everyday.
sentences.zh: 她每天去上学。

sentences.en: My boss is very kind to me.
sentences.zh: 我的老板对我非常好。

sentences.en: I need to report to my boss tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天需要向我的老板汇报。

sentences.en: The surface of the table is smooth.
sentences.zh: 桌子的表面很光滑。

sentences.en: We walked on the surface of the moon in the dream.
sentences.zh: 我们在梦里走在月球表面。

sentences.en: This shirt is made of soft material.
sentences.zh: 这件衬衫是由柔软的材料制成的。

sentences.en: We need to collect enough material for the project.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为这个项目收集足够的材料。

sentences.en: There is a lot of traffic on the road during rush hour.
sentences.zh: 高峰时段路上交通很拥堵。

sentences.en: We need to follow traffic rules to stay safe.
sentences.zh: 我们需要遵守交通规则以保证安全。

sentences.en: The postman delivers letters every morning.
sentences.zh: 邮递员每天早上送信。

sentences.en: My father used to be a postman.
sentences.zh: 我的父亲曾经是一名邮递员。

sentences.en: She wore a red cap.
sentences.zh: 她戴了一顶红色的帽子。

sentences.en: The cap is on the table.
sentences.zh: 帽子在桌子上。

syllables: glove是单音节词，无法进行音节分割，因此没有正确的syllables输出。

sentences.en: She wears a warm glove on her left hand.
sentences.zh: 她左手戴着一只温暖的手套。

sentences.en: I need to buy a new glove because mine is lost.
sentences.zh: 我需要买一只新手套，因为我的不见了。

sentences.en: The school has an international student exchange program.
sentences.zh: 这所学校有一个国际学生交流项目。

sentences.en: We need to learn more about international cultures.
sentences.zh: 我们需要了解更多国际文化。

sentences.en: We need to analyze our competitor's strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.zh: 我们需要分析竞争对手的优势和劣势。

sentences.en: The new company has become a strong competitor in the market.
sentences.zh: 这家新公司已成为市场上强有力的竞争对手。

sentences.en: The cat chased its tail.
sentences.zh: 猫追着它的尾巴。

sentences.en: The tree lost its leaves in autumn.
sentences.zh: 这棵树在秋天掉了叶子。

sentences.en: Please fill out this form carefully.
sentences.zh: 请仔细填写这份表格。

sentences.en: The teacher handed out a form to each student.
sentences.zh: 老师给每个学生发了一张表格。

sentences.en: Potters use clay to make beautiful vases.
sentences.zh: 陶工用黏土制作漂亮的花瓶。

sentences.en: The children are playing with wet clay in the art class.
sentences.zh: 孩子们正在美术课上玩湿黏土。

sentences.en: We had a big celebration for my birthday.
sentences.zh: 我们为我的生日举办了一场盛大的庆祝活动。

sentences.en: The town held a celebration for the festival.
sentences.zh: 这个小镇为节日举行了庆祝活动。

sentences.en: The colorful balloon floats in the sky.
sentences.zh: 彩色的气球在天空中飘浮。

sentences.en: She likes to play with a red balloon.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢玩红色的气球。

sentences.en: Paper cutting is a traditional art form using scissors or knives on paper.
sentences.zh: 剪纸是一种用剪刀或刻刀在纸上创作的传统艺术形式。

sentences.en: We learned how to make beautiful paper cutting in art class.
sentences.zh: 我们在美术课上学习了如何制作漂亮的剪纸。

sentences.en: I use scissors to cut paper.
sentences.zh: 我用剪刀剪纸。

sentences.en: Scissors have two sharp blades.
sentences.zh: 剪刀有两个锋利的刀刃。

zh: 生气勃勃的；（色彩）鲜艳的

sentences.en: The lively children are playing games in the park.
sentences.zh: 活泼的孩子们正在公园里玩游戏。

sentences.en: Her lively personality makes everyone around her happy.
sentences.zh: 她活泼的性格让周围的每个人都很开心。

sentences.en: A fairy tale often begins with 'Once upon a time'.
sentences.zh: 童话故事通常以“很久很久以前”开头。

sentences.en: Children love listening to fairy tales before bedtime.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在睡前听童话故事。

sentences.en: We learn about historical events in history class.
sentences.zh: 我们在历史课上学习历史事件。

sentences.en: This book tells many interesting historical stories.
sentences.zh: 这本书讲述了许多有趣的历史故事。

sentences.en: The sun gives us heat.
sentences.zh: 太阳给我们热量。

sentences.en: We need heat to cook food.
sentences.zh: 我们需要热量来烹饪食物。

sentences.en: I need to polish my English essay before submitting it.
sentences.zh: 在提交之前，我需要润色我的英语作文。

sentences.en: She used a cloth to polish the table until it was shiny.
sentences.zh: 她用一块布擦亮桌子，直到它变得闪闪发光。

sentences.en: My homework is complete.
sentences.zh: 我的作业完成了。

sentences.en: She made a complete plan.
sentences.zh: 她制定了一个完整的计划。

sentences.en: She stepped on my heel accidentally.
sentences.zh: 她不小心踩到了我的脚后跟。

sentences.en: The heel of this shoe is very high.
sentences.zh: 这只鞋的鞋跟很高。

sentences.en: Can you pass me the scoop?
sentences.zh: 你能把勺子递给我吗？

sentences.en: She used a scoop to serve ice cream.
sentences.zh: 她用勺子舀冰淇淋。

sentences.en: We use electricity to light our homes.
sentences.zh: 我们用电来照亮我们的家。

sentences.en: Electricity is an important form of energy.
sentences.zh: 电是一种重要的能量形式。

sentences.en: She likes to change her style often.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢经常改变自己的风格。

sentences.en: This dress has a modern style.
sentences.zh: 这条连衣裙有着现代的风格。

sentences.en: We are working on a science project together.
sentences.zh: 我们正在一起做一个科学项目。

sentences.en: The teacher assigned a new project to the class.
sentences.zh: 老师给班级分配了一个新项目。

sentences.en: It's a pleasure to meet you.
sentences.zh: 很高兴认识你。

sentences.en: She smiled with pleasure at the gift.
sentences.zh: 她收到礼物高兴地笑了。

sentences.en: I need to zip up my jacket with the zipper.
sentences.zh: 我需要用拉链拉上我的夹克。

sentences.en: The zipper on my bag is broken and won't close.
sentences.zh: 我包上的拉链坏了，拉不上了。

sentences.en: I do daily exercise to stay healthy.
sentences.zh: 我每天锻炼以保持健康。

sentences.en: She writes a daily journal before bed.
sentences.zh: 她睡前写每日日记。

sentences.en: Your argument does have a point.
sentences.zh: 你的论点确实有道理。

sentences.en: I think she has a point about the project timeline.
sentences.zh: 我认为她对项目时间表的看法有道理。

sentences.en: I visit a website every day to learn new things.
sentences.zh: 我每天访问一个网站来学习新东西。

sentences.en: You can find information on this website easily.
sentences.zh: 你可以在这个网站上轻松找到信息。

sentences.en: A pioneer is someone who is the first to do something new.
sentences.zh: 先驱者是第一个做新事情的人。

sentences.en: Many pioneers traveled west to explore new lands in history.
sentences.zh: 历史上许多先驱者西行探索新土地。

sentences.en: I need to make a shopping list.
sentences.zh: 我需要列一个购物清单。

sentences.en: The teacher wrote a list of homework on the board.
sentences.zh: 老师在黑板上写了一份家庭作业清单。

sentences.en: The teacher asked me to mention my favorite book in class.
sentences.zh: 老师让我在课堂上提及我最喜欢的书。

sentences.en: Don't forget to mention this important detail in your report.
sentences.zh: 不要忘记在你的报告中提及这个重要细节。

sentences.en: The broken vase was an accidental mistake, not done on purpose.
sentences.zh: 这个打碎的花瓶是个意外的错误，不是故意的。

sentences.en: She made an accidental discovery of the old letter while cleaning the attic.
sentences.zh: 她在打扫阁楼时意外发现了这封旧信。

sentences.en: I found this old photo by accident while cleaning my room.
sentences.zh: 我在打扫房间时偶然发现了这张旧照片。

sentences.en: She met her favorite singer by accident at the airport yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天在机场偶然遇到了她最喜欢的歌手。

sentences.en: I use a ruler to draw straight lines.
sentences.zh: 我用尺子画直线。

sentences.en: The ruler on the desk is blue.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的尺子是蓝色的。

sentences.en: You need to boil water to make tea.
sentences.zh: 你需要烧水来泡茶。

sentences.en: The pot will boil in five minutes.
sentences.zh: 锅里的水五分钟后会沸腾。

sentences.en: Some cookies remain in the jar.
sentences.zh: 罐子里还剩下一些饼干。

sentences.en: Please remain seated until the bell rings.
sentences.zh: 请一直坐着直到铃响。

sentences.en: Dogs have a strong sense of smell.
sentences.zh: 狗有很强的嗅觉。

sentences.en: I can smell the fresh bread from the kitchen.
sentences.zh: 我能闻到厨房里新鲜面包的味道。

sentences.en: A saint is a person who is very holy and kind.
sentences.zh: 圣徒是非常圣洁和善良的人。

sentences.en: Many people pray to saints for guidance and help.
sentences.zh: 许多人向圣徒祈祷以寻求指引和帮助。

sentences.en: The national flag is flying high.
sentences.zh: 国旗高高飘扬。

sentences.en: We should love our national culture.
sentences.zh: 我们应该热爱我们的民族文化。

sentences.en: International trade helps countries exchange goods and services.
sentences.zh: 国际贸易帮助各国交换商品和服务。

sentences.en: We learned about trade between ancient civilizations in history class.
sentences.zh: 我们在历史课上学习了古代文明之间的贸易。

sentences.en: The meeting will take place in the conference room.
sentences.zh: 会议将在会议室举行。

sentences.en: The school sports day will take place next Friday.
sentences.zh: 学校运动会将在下周五举行。

sentences.en: The popularity of this song has increased recently.
sentences.zh: 这首歌的 popularity（ popularity ）最近上升了。

sentences.en: We can measure the popularity of a book by its sales.
sentences.zh: 我们可以通过销量来衡量一本书的 popularity（ popularity ）。

sentences.en: I have some doubt about this theory.
sentences.zh: 我对这个理论有些怀疑。

sentences.en: Her doubt made her hesitate to decide.
sentences.zh: 她的怀疑使她在做决定时犹豫不决。

sentences.en: She is without doubt the best student in our class.
sentences.zh: 她无疑是我们班最好的学生。

sentences.en: Without doubt, this is the most interesting book I've ever read.
sentences.zh: 毫无疑问，这是我读过的最有趣的书。

sentences.en: I put milk in the fridge.
sentences.zh: 我把牛奶放进冰箱。

sentences.en: The fridge keeps food cold.
sentences.zh: 冰箱使食物保持寒冷。

sentences.en: The temperature today is low.
sentences.zh: 今天气温很低。

sentences.en: She has a low voice.
sentences.zh: 她的声音很低。

sentences.en: Somebody is knocking at the door.
sentences.zh: 有人正在敲门。

sentences.en: I need to ask somebody for help.
sentences.zh: 我需要向某人求助。

sentences.en: We need to translate this sentence into Chinese.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把这个句子翻译成中文。

sentences.en: Can you help me translate this word?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我翻译这个单词吗？

sentences.en: Please lock the door before leaving.
sentences.zh: 离开前请锁门。

sentences.en: I need a key to lock the box.
sentences.zh: 我需要一把钥匙来锁这个盒子。

sentences.en: She wears a beautiful ring on her finger.
sentences.zh: 她手指上戴着一枚漂亮的戒指。

sentences.en: Please ring the doorbell when you arrive.
sentences.zh: 你到达时请按门铃。

sentences.en: An earthquake is a sudden shaking of the ground caused by movements in the Earth's crust.
sentences.zh: 地震是由地壳运动引起的地面突然震动。

sentences.en: Scientists use seismometers to measure and study earthquakes.
sentences.zh: 科学家使用地震仪来测量和研究地震。

sentences.en: A sudden rain caught us without umbrellas.
sentences.zh: 一场突如其来的雨让我们没带伞就被淋了。

sentences.en: She felt a sudden pain in her stomach.
sentences.zh: 她突然感到胃部一阵疼痛。

sentences.en: All of a sudden, it started to rain heavily.
sentences.zh: 突然，天开始下大雨了。

sentences.en: He stood up and left all of a sudden.
sentences.zh: 他突然站起来离开了。

sentences.en: The bell rings loudly in the morning.
sentences.zh: 早上铃声大声地响了。

sentences.en: Please ring the bell when you arrive.
sentences.zh: 当你到达时请按铃。

sentences.en: I like to eat a biscuit for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢早餐吃一块饼干。

sentences.en: My mom baked some delicious biscuits yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈昨天烤了一些美味的饼干。

sentences.en: A cookie is a small piece of data stored on your computer by a website.
sentences.zh: Cookie是网站存储在你电脑上的一小段数据。

sentences.en: You can clear cookies in your browser settings to remove stored information.
sentences.zh: 你可以在浏览器设置中清除Cookie以删除存储的信息。

sentences.en: A musical is a play or movie that uses singing and dancing to tell a story.
sentences.zh: 音乐剧是一种通过歌唱和舞蹈来讲述故事的戏剧或电影。

sentences.en: We are going to watch a famous musical at the theater tonight.
sentences.zh: 今晚我们要去剧院看一场著名的音乐剧。

sentences.en: She plays a musical instrument every day.
sentences.zh: 她每天演奏一种乐器。

sentences.en: The scientist used a special instrument in the experiment.
sentences.zh: 这位科学家在实验中使用了一种特殊仪器。

sentences.en: The fried chicken is crispy and delicious.
sentences.zh: 炸鸡酥脆又美味。

sentences.en: I like crispy potato chips very much.
sentences.zh: 我非常喜欢酥脆的薯片。

sentences.en: The soup is too salty for me.
sentences.zh: 这汤对我来说太咸了。

sentences.en: She added some salt to make the dish salty.
sentences.zh: 她加了些盐让这道菜变咸。

sentences.en: The lemon tastes sour.
sentences.zh: 这个柠檬尝起来是酸的。

sentences.en: Sour candy makes my mouth water.
sentences.zh: 酸糖果让我流口水。

sentences.en: I took your book by mistake.
sentences.zh: 我误拿了你的书。

sentences.en: She deleted the file by mistake.
sentences.zh: 她误删了那个文件。

sentences.en: The customer bought a new phone from the store.
sentences.zh: 这位顾客从商店买了一部新手机。

sentences.en: The staff should always be polite to the customer.
sentences.zh: 员工应该始终对顾客有礼貌。

sentences.en: The Olympics is a major international sports event held every four years.
sentences.zh: 奥运会是每四年举办一次的重大国际体育赛事。

sentences.en: Athletes from around the world compete in the Olympics to win medals.
sentences.zh: 来自世界各地的运动员在奥运会上竞争以赢得奖牌。

sentences.en: She is a Canadian student who loves maple syrup.
sentences.zh: 她是一名喜欢枫糖浆的加拿大学生。

sentences.en: Canadian people often celebrate Canada Day on July 1st.
sentences.zh: 加拿大人通常在7月1日庆祝加拿大日。

sentences.en: Can you divide this cake into eight pieces?
sentences.zh: 你能把这个蛋糕分成八块吗？

sentences.en: We need to divide the work equally among the team members.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在团队成员之间平均分配工作。

sentences.en: We can divide the cake into six pieces.
sentences.zh: 我们可以把蛋糕分成六块。

sentences.en: The teacher will divide the class into four groups.
sentences.zh: 老师会把班级分成四个小组。

sentences.en: She put apples in the basket.
sentences.zh: 她把苹果放进了篮子里。

sentences.en: I carry a basket to the market.
sentences.zh: 我提着一个篮子去市场。

sentences.en: She not only sings well but also dances beautifully.
sentences.zh: 她不仅唱歌好，而且跳舞也很美。

sentences.en: Not only does he study hard, but he also helps others.
sentences.zh: 他不仅学习努力，还帮助别人。

sentences.en: Many children look up to their parents as role models.
sentences.zh: 许多孩子把父母视为榜样而敬仰他们。

sentences.en: We should look up to people who work hard and help others.
sentences.zh: 我们应该敬仰那些努力工作并帮助他人的人。

sentences.en: A hero is someone who helps others bravely.
sentences.zh: 英雄是勇敢帮助他人的人。

sentences.en: We should learn from the hero's spirit.
sentences.zh: 我们应该学习英雄的精神。

sentences.en: She is a professional doctor with many years of experience.
sentences.zh: 她是一位有多年经验的专业医生。

sentences.en: To become professional, you need to practice hard every day.
sentences.zh: 要变得专业，你需要每天努力练习。

sentences.en: I nearly missed the bus this morning.
sentences.zh: 今天早上我差点错过了公交车。

sentences.en: She has nearly finished her homework.
sentences.zh: 她差不多完成作业了。

sentences.en: You need a license to drive a car.
sentences.zh: 开车需要驾照。

sentences.en: The software requires a valid license to use.
sentences.zh: 这个软件需要有效的许可才能使用。

sentences.en: Safety is very important in our daily life.
sentences.zh: 安全在我们的日常生活中非常重要。

sentences.en: We should always remember to pay attention to safety.
sentences.zh: 我们应该时刻记住注意安全。

sentences.en: Smoking is harmful to health.
sentences.zh: 吸烟有害健康。

sentences.en: No smoking in public places.
sentences.zh: 公共场所禁止吸烟。

sentences.en: She works a part-time job at the café.
sentences.zh: 她在咖啡馆做兼职工作。

sentences.en: I need a part-time position to earn extra money.
sentences.zh: 我需要一份兼职来赚外快。

sentences.en: Can you pierce the paper with this needle?
sentences.zh: 你能用这根针穿透纸吗？

sentences.en: The sunlight seemed to pierce through the dark clouds.
sentences.zh: 阳光似乎穿透了乌云。

sentences.en: She wears a beautiful earring on her left ear.
sentences.zh: 她的左耳戴着一只漂亮的耳环。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new earring as a birthday gift.
sentences.zh: 妈妈给我买了一只新耳环作为生日礼物。

sentences.en: A flash of lightning lit up the sky.
sentences.zh: 一道闪电照亮了天空。

sentences.en: The camera can take photos with a flash.
sentences.zh: 这台相机可以用闪光灯拍照。

sentences.en: A tiny cat is sleeping on the mat.
sentences.zh: 一只小猫正在垫子上睡觉。

sentences.en: She has a tiny toy in her hand.
sentences.zh: 她手里有一个小玩具。

sentences.en: When she heard the sad news, she began to cry.
sentences.zh: 当她听到这个悲伤的消息时，她开始哭了。

sentences.en: The baby will cry if he is hungry.
sentences.zh: 如果宝宝饿了，他就会哭。

sentences.en: She works in the field of medicine.
sentences.zh: 她在医学领域工作。

sentences.en: The farmers were working in the fields under the hot sun.
sentences.zh: 农民们在炎热的阳光下在田里劳作。

sentences.en: She gave me a warm hug.
sentences.zh: 她给了我一个温暖的拥抱。

sentences.en: Hug your friend to show care.
sentences.zh: 拥抱你的朋友以表示关心。

sentences.en: We need to take the lift to the 5th floor.
sentences.zh: 我们需要乘电梯到5楼。

sentences.en: Can you help me lift this heavy box?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我抬一下这个重箱子吗？

sentences.en: She played the piano badly.
sentences.zh: 她钢琴弹得很差。

sentences.en: I slept badly last night.
sentences.zh: 我昨晚睡得不好。

sentences.en: It's not polite to talk back to your parents.
sentences.zh: 和父母顶嘴是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: The teacher told the student not to talk back in class.
sentences.zh: 老师告诉学生不要在课堂上顶嘴。

sentences.en: The weather today is awful.
sentences.zh: 今天的天气糟透了。

sentences.en: She felt awful after eating the bad food.
sentences.zh: 吃了变质的食物后，她感觉很不舒服。

sentences.en: A teen is a person between 13 and 19 years old.
sentences.zh: 青少年是指13到19岁之间的人。

sentences.en: She is a teen who enjoys reading books.
sentences.zh: 她是一个喜欢读书的青少年。

sentences.en: She felt regret after missing the important meeting.
sentences.zh: 错过重要会议后，她感到后悔。

sentences.en: He expressed regret for his rude behavior.
sentences.zh: 他为自己的粗鲁行为表示歉意。

sentences.en: A poem is a beautiful form of writing with rhythm and rhyme.
sentences.zh: 诗歌是一种具有节奏和韵律的优美文体。

sentences.en: We read a poem to enjoy its vivid images and deep feelings.
sentences.zh: 我们读诗歌是为了欣赏其生动的意象和深厚的情感。

sentences.en: Our community has a big park where children can play.
sentences.zh: 我们的社区有一个大公园，孩子们可以在那里玩耍。

sentences.en: People in the community often help each other.
sentences.zh: 社区里的人们经常互相帮助。

sentences.en: You should keep away from the busy road.
sentences.zh: 你应该远离繁忙的马路。

sentences.en: Please keep away from the dangerous animals.
sentences.zh: 请远离危险的动物。

sentences.en: You have a chance to win the game.
sentences.zh: 你有机会赢得这场比赛。

sentences.en: She missed the chance to study abroad.
sentences.zh: 她错过了出国留学的机会。

sentences.en: It's important for teenagers to learn to make their own decisions.
sentences.zh: 青少年学会自己做决定是很重要的。

sentences.en: She decided to make her own decision instead of following others' advice.
sentences.zh: 她决定自己做决定，而不是听从别人的建议。

sentences.en: Teachers educate students every day.
sentences.zh: 老师们每天教育学生。

sentences.en: Parents also play a role to educate their children.
sentences.zh: 父母也扮演着教育孩子的角色。

zh: 完成（困难的事）；应付（困难局面）

sentences.en: She needs to manage her time wisely for the exam.
sentences.zh: 她需要为考试明智地管理时间。

sentences.en: My father helps manage the family business.
sentences.zh: 我父亲帮忙管理家族生意。

sentences.en: Society is made up of many different people and families.
sentences.zh: 社会是由许多不同的人和家庭组成的。

sentences.en: We learn to get along with others in society.
sentences.zh: 我们在社会中学习与他人相处。

sentences.en: Don't let fear get in the way of your dreams.
sentences.zh: 不要让恐惧阻碍你的梦想。

sentences.en: His busy work schedule didn't get in the way of his family time.
sentences.zh: 他繁忙的工作安排并没有妨碍他的家庭时间。

sentences.en: I need your support to finish the project.
sentences.zh: 我需要你的支持来完成这个项目。

sentences.en: Her support gave me the courage to keep going.
sentences.zh: 她的支持给了我继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Press the enter key to start a new line.
sentences.zh: 按回车键开始新的一行。

sentences.en: After typing your name, please hit enter.
sentences.zh: 输入你的名字后，请按回车键。

sentences.en: You have to make a choice between the two options.
sentences.zh: 你必须在这两个选项之间做出选择。

sentences.en: Her choice of dress for the party was very elegant.
sentences.zh: 她为派对选择的裙子非常优雅。

sentences.en: Whose book is this on the desk?
sentences.zh: 桌子上的这本书是谁的？

sentences.en: Do you know whose umbrella was left in the classroom?
sentences.zh: 你知道谁的雨伞落在教室里了吗？

sentences.en: The big truck is carrying goods.
sentences.zh: 这辆大卡车正在运送货物。

sentences.en: We can see a red truck on the road.
sentences.zh: 我们能在路上看到一辆红色的卡车。

sentences.en: We are going to have a picnic in the park this Sunday.
sentences.zh: 这个星期天我们要去公园野餐。

sentences.en: Don't forget to bring some snacks for the picnic.
sentences.zh: 别忘了为野餐带些零食。

sentences.en: A rabbit has long ears and likes to hop.
sentences.zh: 兔子有长长的耳朵，喜欢蹦蹦跳跳。

sentences.en: I saw a cute rabbit eating carrots in the garden.
sentences.zh: 我看见一只可爱的兔子在花园里吃胡萝卜。

sentences.en: I need to attend the meeting tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天需要参加会议。

sentences.en: She will attend her friend's birthday party.
sentences.zh: 她将参加朋友的生日派对。

zh: 贵重的；很有用的；宝贵的

sentences.en: This book is very valuable for learning English.
sentences.zh: 这本书对学习英语很有价值。

sentences.en: Time is the most valuable thing we have.
sentences.zh: 时间是我们拥有的最宝贵的东西。

sentences.en: Her favorite color is pink.
sentences.zh: 她最喜欢的颜色是粉色。

sentences.en: The little girl is wearing a pink dress.
sentences.zh: 这个小女孩穿着一条粉色的连衣裙。

sentences.en: Is there anybody in the room?
sentences.zh: 房间里有人吗？

sentences.en: Anybody can join the club if they want.
sentences.zh: 任何人想加入俱乐部都可以。

sentences.en: What is happening over there?
sentences.zh: 那边正在发生什么事？

sentences.en: We need to find out what's happening.
sentences.zh: 我们需要弄清楚正在发生什么。

sentences.en: The loud noise from the construction site woke me up.
sentences.zh: 建筑工地的巨大噪音把我吵醒了。

sentences.en: Please turn down the music; it's making too much noise.
sentences.zh: 请把音乐关小一点，太吵了。

sentences.en: The policeman helps people in need.
sentences.zh: 警察帮助有需要的人。

sentences.en: A policeman wears a uniform and a hat.
sentences.zh: 警察穿着制服，戴着帽子。

sentences.en: A wolf is a wild animal that looks like a large dog.
sentences.zh: 狼是一种看起来像大狗的野生动物。

sentences.en: The wolf howled loudly in the forest at night.
sentences.zh: 夜晚，狼在森林里大声嚎叫。

sentences.en: She felt uneasy before the exam.
sentences.zh: 考试前她感到不安。

sentences.en: The strange noise made him uneasy.
sentences.zh: 奇怪的声音让他感到不安。

sentences.en: We conduct experiments in the laboratory.
sentences.zh: 我们在实验室里做实验。

sentences.en: The laboratory is equipped with modern instruments.
sentences.zh: 这个实验室配备了现代化的仪器。

sentences.en: We love playing outdoors on sunny days.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在晴天去户外玩耍。

sentences.en: Camping is a fun outdoors activity.
sentences.zh: 露营是一项有趣的户外活动。

sentences.en: She wears a warm coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 她冬天穿一件暖和的外套。

sentences.en: My father bought a new coat for me.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸给我买了一件新外套。

sentences.en: I feel sleepy after staying up late.
sentences.zh: 熬夜后我感到困倦。

sentences.en: The cat looks sleepy in the warm sun.
sentences.zh: 这只猫在温暖的阳光下看起来很困。

sentences.en: Farmers work on the land to grow crops.
sentences.zh: 农民在土地上耕种庄稼。

sentences.en: We need land to build houses and parks.
sentences.zh: 我们需要土地来建造房屋和公园。

sentences.en: The movie is about an alien from Mars.
sentences.zh: 这部电影是关于一个来自火星的外星人。

sentences.en: She thinks there might be an alien in the forest.
sentences.zh: 她认为森林里可能有一个外星人。

sentences.en: The dog likes to run after the cat in the garden.
sentences.zh: 这只狗喜欢在花园里追着猫跑。

sentences.en: Children often run after the ice cream truck on hot days.
sentences.zh: 孩子们在大热天经常追着冰淇淋车跑。

sentences.en: He wears a black suit to work every day.
sentences.zh: 他每天穿一套黑色西装上班。

sentences.en: This suit fits me perfectly.
sentences.zh: 这套西装非常合身。

sentences.en: I need to express my thanks to you.
sentences.zh: 我需要向你表达我的感谢。

sentences.en: Can you express your feelings in English?
sentences.zh: 你能用英语表达你的感受吗？

sentences.en: She was laughing and crying at the same time.
sentences.zh: 她一边笑一边哭。

sentences.en: We need to work hard and rest well at the same time.
sentences.zh: 我们需要同时努力工作和好好休息。

sentences.en: A circle is a round shape with no corners.
sentences.zh: 圆形是一种没有棱角的圆形形状。

sentences.en: The moon looks like a big circle in the sky at night.
sentences.zh: 晚上月亮在天空中看起来像一个大圆形。

sentences.en: Britain is a country in Europe.
sentences.zh: 英国是欧洲的一个国家。

sentences.en: London is the capital of Britain.
sentences.zh: 伦敦是英国的首都。

sentences.en: She loves reading mystery novels.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢读悬疑小说。

sentences.en: The old house is full of mystery.
sentences.zh: 这座老房子充满了神秘。

sentences.en: I receive a letter from my friend.
sentences.zh: 我收到一封来自朋友的信。

sentences.en: She will receive a gift on her birthday.
sentences.zh: 她将在生日那天收到一份礼物。

sentences.en: A historian studies and writes about past events.
sentences.zh: 历史学家研究和撰写过去的事件。

sentences.en: My dream is to become a historian who explores ancient civilizations.
sentences.zh: 我的梦想是成为一名探索古代文明的历史学家。

sentences.en: We visited an ancient temple yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天参观了一座古老的寺庙。

sentences.en: The temple is located on the top of the hill.
sentences.zh: 那座寺庙坐落在山顶上。

sentences.en: A good leader can guide the team to success.
sentences.zh: 一个好的领导者能够引导团队走向成功。

sentences.en: She was elected as the leader of our class.
sentences.zh: 她被选为我们班的班长。

sentences.en: Midsummer is the middle of summer, usually around June or July.
sentences.zh: 仲夏是夏天的中期，通常在六月或七月左右。

sentences.en: People often celebrate midsummer with bonfires and flower crowns in some countries.
sentences.zh: 在一些国家，人们通常会用火堆和花冠来庆祝仲夏。

sentences.en: She is studying medical science at university.
sentences.zh: 她正在大学学习医学。

sentences.en: The hospital has a new medical equipment.
sentences.zh: 这家医院有一台新的医疗设备。

phrases.en: the goal or aim of an action

sentences.en: The purpose of studying hard is to gain knowledge.
sentences.zh: 努力学习的目的是获取知识。

sentences.en: We should clarify the purpose before starting a project.
sentences.zh: 开始一个项目前我们应该明确目的。

sentences.en: We should wash hands to prevent illness.
sentences.zh: 我们应该洗手来预防疾病。

sentences.en: Wearing a seatbelt can prevent accidents.
sentences.zh: 系安全带可以防止事故。

sentences.en: Solar panels convert sunlight into energy.
sentences.zh: 太阳能电池板将阳光转化为能量。

sentences.en: We need energy to run and play.
sentences.zh: 我们需要能量来跑步和玩耍。

sentences.en: My position in the classroom is near the window.
sentences.zh: 我在教室里的位置靠近窗户。

sentences.en: Can you tell me your position on this issue?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我你在这个问题上的立场吗？

sentences.en: The burial of the ancient king took place in a grand ceremony.
sentences.zh: 这位古代国王的葬礼在一场盛大的仪式中举行。

sentences.en: Archaeologists discovered a burial site with many valuable artifacts.
sentences.zh: 考古学家发现了一个有许多珍贵文物的墓葬遗址。

sentences.en: He received an honor for his bravery.
sentences.zh: 他因勇敢获得了荣誉。

sentences.en: It is an honor to meet you.
sentences.zh: 见到您很荣幸。

sentences.en: My ancestor lived in this village a long time ago.
sentences.zh: 我的祖先很久以前住在这个村子里。

sentences.en: We can learn about our family history from our ancestors.
sentences.zh: 我们可以从祖先那里了解我们的家族历史。

sentences.en: The team celebrated their victory with joy.
sentences.zh: 团队高兴地庆祝他们的胜利。

sentences.en: Winning the game brought us great victory.
sentences.zh: 赢得比赛给我们带来了巨大的胜利。

sentences.en: The hero defeated the enemy in the battle.
sentences.zh: 英雄在战斗中击败了敌人。

sentences.en: We should always be aware of our potential enemy.
sentences.zh: 我们应该时刻警惕潜在的敌人。

sentences.en: The class period starts at 9 o'clock every morning.
sentences.zh: 每节课早上九点开始。

sentences.en: We have a rest period between two classes.
sentences.zh: 我们两节课之间有休息时间。

sentences.en: I prefer coffee to tea.
sentences.zh: 比起茶，我更喜欢咖啡。

sentences.en: She prefers reading books in her free time.
sentences.zh: 她空闲时间更喜欢读书。

sentences.en: I like singing lyrics.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢唱歌词。

sentences.en: The lyrics of this song are beautiful.
sentences.zh: 这首歌的歌词很美。

sentences.en: An Australian is a person from Australia.
sentences.zh: 澳大利亚人是来自澳大利亚的人。

sentences.en: She met an Australian student at the international conference.
sentences.zh: 她在国际会议上遇到了一位澳大利亚学生。

sentences.en: My father bought an electronic watch for me.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸给我买了一块电子手表。

sentences.en: Electronic devices are very popular among young people.
sentences.zh: 电子设备在年轻人中很受欢迎。

sentences.en: Suppose you have a book, what will you read first?
sentences.zh: 假设你有一本书，你会先读什么？

sentences.en: Let's suppose the answer is correct, then we can move on.
sentences.zh: 让我们假设答案是正确的，然后我们可以继续。

sentences.en: The surface of the lake is smooth like a mirror.
sentences.zh: 湖面像镜子一样光滑。

sentences.en: She uses lotion to keep her skin smooth.
sentences.zh: 她用乳液保持皮肤光滑。

sentences.en: I always keep a spare key in my bag.
sentences.zh: 我总是在包里放一把备用钥匙。

sentences.en: Do you have any spare time to help me?
sentences.zh: 你有空闲时间帮我吗？

sentences.en: The director of the movie won an award.
sentences.zh: 这部电影的导演获得了一个奖项。

sentences.en: She wants to be a director when she grows up.
sentences.zh: 她长大后想成为一名导演。

sentences.en: In this case, we need to find a solution.
sentences.zh: 在这种情况下，我们需要找到一个解决方案。

sentences.en: The teacher explained the case to the students clearly.
sentences.zh: 老师向学生们清楚地解释了这个案例。

zh: 既然那样；假使那样的话

sentences.en: If it rains tomorrow, we'll stay indoors; in that case, we can watch a movie.
sentences.zh: 如果明天下雨，我们就待在室内；那样的话，我们可以看电影。

sentences.en: She said she might be late. In that case, we should start the meeting without her.
sentences.zh: 她说她可能会迟到。那样的话，我们应该不等她就开始会议。

sentences.en: War is a conflict between countries or groups.
sentences.zh: 战争是国家或群体之间的冲突。

sentences.en: People suffer a lot during a war.
sentences.zh: 人们在战争期间遭受很多苦难。

sentences.en: He used a stick to draw a line on the ground.
sentences.zh: 他用一根棍子在地上画了一条线。

sentences.en: The old man walked slowly with a stick in his hand.
sentences.zh: 那位老人手里拄着拐杖慢慢走着。

sentences.en: If you stick to your goals, you will achieve them eventually.
sentences.zh: 如果你坚持你的目标，最终你会实现它们。

sentences.en: It's important to stick to the plan when working on a project.
sentences.zh: 做项目时坚持计划是很重要的。

sentences.en: The ball rolled down the hill.
sentences.zh: 球滚下了山。

sentences.en: Prices tend to go down in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天物价往往会下降。

sentences.en: We had a long dialog yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天进行了一场长对话。

sentences.en: The dialog between them is very interesting.
sentences.zh: 他们之间的对话很有趣。

sentences.en: The story has a happy ending.
sentences.zh: 这个故事有一个快乐的结局。

sentences.en: We are approaching the ending of the movie.
sentences.zh: 我们快要到电影的结尾了。

sentences.en: We watched a documentary about ocean life in class.
sentences.zh: 我们在课上看了一部关于海洋生物的纪录片。

sentences.en: She enjoys making documentaries that tell real stories.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢制作讲述真实故事的纪录片。

sentences.en: She loves watching drama series in her free time.
sentences.zh: 她空闲时间喜欢看电视剧。

sentences.en: The school will put on a drama next month.
sentences.zh: 学校下个月将上演一出戏剧。

sentences.en: There are plenty of books in the library.
sentences.zh: 图书馆里有很多书。

sentences.en: We have plenty of time to finish the work.
sentences.zh: 我们有充足的时间完成这项工作。

sentences.en: There are plenty of books on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 书架上有很多书。

sentences.en: She has plenty of time to finish her homework.
sentences.zh: 她有充足的时间完成作业。

sentences.en: Please shut the door.
sentences.zh: 请关上门。

sentences.en: She shut her eyes tightly.
sentences.zh: 她紧紧闭上了眼睛。

sentences.en: Please shut off the lights when you leave the room.
sentences.zh: 离开房间时请关掉灯。

sentences.en: He had to shut off the water supply to fix the pipe.
sentences.zh: 他不得不关闭供水来修理管道。

sentences.en: A superhero is someone who has special powers and helps people.
sentences.zh: 超级英雄是拥有特殊能力并帮助他人的人。

sentences.en: Children often like to read stories about superheroes saving the world.
sentences.zh: 孩子们经常喜欢读关于超级英雄拯救世界的故事。

sentences.en: I like to go hiking once in a while.
sentences.zh: 我偶尔喜欢去远足。

sentences.en: She calls her grandparents once in a while.
sentences.zh: 她偶尔给她的祖父母打电话。

sentences.en: An intelligent student always asks good questions.
sentences.zh: 聪明的学生总是会提出好问题。

sentences.en: She used her intelligent mind to solve the difficult problem.
sentences.zh: 她用她聪明的头脑解决了这个难题。

sentences.en: I have a good sense of direction.
sentences.zh: 我有很好的方向感。

sentences.en: She has a keen sense of smell.
sentences.zh: 她有敏锐的嗅觉。

sentences.en: Her eyes were filled with sadness when she heard the news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个消息时，她的眼中充满了悲伤。

sentences.en: Music can sometimes express sadness more deeply than words.
sentences.zh: 音乐有时比语言更能深刻地表达悲伤。

sentences.en: She felt a sharp pain in her knee.
sentences.zh: 她感到膝盖一阵剧烈的疼痛。

sentences.en: The pain in his back made it hard to sit.
sentences.zh: 他背部的疼痛让他难以坐下。

sentences.en: I like to reflect on my day before bed.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在睡前反思我的一天。

sentences.en: The mirror can reflect a clear image.
sentences.zh: 镜子能反射出清晰的影像。

sentences.en: We are moving to a new house next month.
sentences.zh: 我们下个月要搬到新房子去。

sentences.en: The moving company will help us with the boxes.
sentences.zh: 搬家公司会帮我们处理这些箱子。

sentences.en: She will perform a song on stage.
sentences.zh: 她将在舞台上表演一首歌。

sentences.en: We need to perform our duties carefully.
sentences.zh: 我们需要认真履行我们的职责。

sentences.en: The lifetime of a butterfly is usually short.
sentences.zh: 蝴蝶的寿命通常很短。

sentences.en: We should cherish every moment in our lifetime.
sentences.zh: 我们应该珍惜一生中的每一刻。

sentences.en: I felt pity for the homeless dog in the rain.
sentences.zh: 我对雨中那只无家可归的狗感到同情。

sentences.en: Her story about overcoming hardship made everyone feel pity and admiration.
sentences.zh: 她克服困难的故事让每个人既感到同情又充满敬佩。

sentences.en: The total of 3 and 5 is 8.
sentences.zh: 3和5的总和是8。

sentences.en: What is the total number of students in the class?
sentences.zh: 班里学生的总人数是多少？

sentences.en: In total, there are five books on the desk.
sentences.zh: 书桌上总共有五本书。

sentences.en: She spent 100 dollars in total on the shopping trip.
sentences.zh: 她这次购物之旅总共花了100美元。

sentences.en: The dog follows its master.
sentences.zh: 这只狗跟着它的主人。

sentences.en: He is the master of this house.
sentences.zh: 他是这座房子的主人。

sentences.en: Teachers often praise students for good work.
sentences.zh: 老师们经常因为学生表现好而表扬他们。

sentences.en: She received praise for her beautiful painting.
sentences.zh: 她因美丽的画作受到了表扬。

sentences.en: I need to recall the information for the test.
sentences.zh: 我需要为考试回忆信息。

sentences.en: Can you recall what happened yesterday?
sentences.zh: 你能回忆起昨天发生了什么吗？

sentences.en: The nurse cleaned the wound carefully.
sentences.zh: 护士仔细地清洗了伤口。

sentences.en: He got a deep wound on his arm during the accident.
sentences.zh: 事故中他的手臂上受了很深的伤。

zh: 令人痛苦的；令人疼痛的

sentences.en: The injection was painful.
sentences.zh: 打针很疼。

sentences.en: She felt a painful sting on her arm.
sentences.zh: 她感到手臂上一阵刺痛。

sentences.en: Different countries have their own customs.
sentences.zh: 不同的国家有自己的风俗习惯。

sentences.en: It's a custom in our family to have a big dinner on New Year's Eve.
sentences.zh: 我们家有个习俗，就是在除夕夜吃一顿丰盛的晚餐。

sentences.en: He gave a bow to the audience after his performance.
sentences.zh: 他表演结束后向观众鞠了一躬。

sentences.en: She used a bow to tie the ribbon on the gift.
sentences.zh: 她用蝴蝶结把缎带系在礼物上。

sentences.en: She gave me a gentle kiss on the cheek.
sentences.zh: 她在我脸颊上轻轻地吻了一下。

sentences.en: The mother planted a kiss on her baby's forehead.
sentences.zh: 妈妈在宝宝的额头上亲了一下。

sentences.en: I greet my teacher in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我早上向老师打招呼。

sentences.en: People often greet each other with a smile.
sentences.zh: 人们经常用微笑互相打招呼。

sentences.en: After finishing my homework, I feel relaxed.
sentences.zh: 完成作业后，我感到很放松。

sentences.en: She likes to listen to music to stay relaxed.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢听音乐来保持放松。

sentences.en: We should always value the time we spend with our friends.
sentences.zh: 我们应该珍惜和朋友在一起的时光。

sentences.en: The value of this painting has increased over the years.
sentences.zh: 这幅画的价值随着时间的推移而增加。

sentences.en: Can you drop by my house after school?
sentences.zh: 放学后你能顺便来我家一趟吗？

sentences.en: She often drops by the café to have a coffee.
sentences.zh: 她经常顺便去咖啡馆喝杯咖啡。

sentences.en: The capital of France is Paris.
sentences.zh: 法国的首都是巴黎。

sentences.en: We visited the capital city during our trip.
sentences.zh: 我们在旅行期间参观了首都城市。

sentences.en: She decided to forgive him after all.
sentences.zh: 她终究还是决定原谅他。

sentences.en: After all, he is just a child.
sentences.zh: 毕竟，他还只是个孩子。

sentences.en: We usually have lunch at noon.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在中午吃午饭。

sentences.en: The sun is high in the sky at noon.
sentences.zh: 中午时分太阳高挂在天空。

sentences.en: She was mad because she missed the bus.
sentences.zh: 她因为错过了公交车而生气。

sentences.en: Don't be mad at me; it was an accident.
sentences.zh: 别生我的气，那是个意外。

sentences.en: It's easy to get mad when things go wrong.
sentences.zh: 当事情出错时，很容易生气。

sentences.en: Don't get mad at him; he didn't mean it.
sentences.zh: 别生他的气，他不是故意的。

sentences.en: Success requires a lot of effort.
sentences.zh: 成功需要大量的努力。

sentences.en: She put in great effort to finish the project on time.
sentences.zh: 她付出了巨大的努力以按时完成项目。

sentences.en: You need to make an effort to learn English well.
sentences.zh: 你需要努力学好英语。

sentences.en: She always makes an effort to help others.
sentences.zh: 她总是努力帮助别人。

sentences.en: You need a passport to travel to another country.
sentences.zh: 去另一个国家旅行需要护照。

sentences.en: My passport contains my personal information and photo.
sentences.zh: 我的护照包含我的个人信息和照片。

sentences.en: Please clean off the table before dinner.
sentences.zh: 晚餐前请把桌子清理干净。

sentences.en: She used a cloth to clean off the dust from the shelf.
sentences.zh: 她用一块布擦掉了架子上的灰尘。

sentences.en: The teacher writes on the blackboard with chalk.
sentences.zh: 老师用粉笔在黑板上写字。

sentences.en: I need a piece of chalk to draw a picture.
sentences.zh: 我需要一支粉笔来画画。

sentences.en: The teacher writes on the blackboard.
sentences.zh: 老师在黑板上写字。

sentences.en: We can see words on the blackboard.
sentences.zh: 我们能在黑板上看到字。

sentences.en: The northern part of the country is very cold in winter.
sentences.zh: 这个国家的北部在冬天非常冷。

sentences.en: She comes from a small town in northern Canada.
sentences.zh: 她来自加拿大北部的一个小镇。

sentences.en: We walked along the coast and enjoyed the sea breeze.
sentences.zh: 我们沿着海岸散步，享受着海风。

sentences.en: The town is located on the coast, with beautiful beaches.
sentences.zh: 这个小镇坐落在海岸边，有着美丽的沙滩。

sentences.en: There are four seasons in a year.
sentences.zh: 一年有四个季节。

sentences.en: Spring is my favorite season.
sentences.zh: 春天是我最喜欢的季节。

sentences.en: Please knock on the door before entering.
sentences.zh: 进入前请敲门。

sentences.en: I heard someone knock at the window last night.
sentences.zh: 昨晚我听到有人敲窗户。

sentences.en: The eastern part of the country has a longer coastline.
sentences.zh: 这个国家的东部有更长的海岸线。

sentences.en: We are traveling to the eastern city next week.
sentences.zh: 我们下周要去东部的城市旅行。

sentences.en: The plane will take off in ten minutes.
sentences.zh: 飞机将在十分钟后起飞。

sentences.en: She had to take off her wet shoes before entering the house.
sentences.zh: 她进屋前不得不脱下湿鞋子。

sentences.en: This book is worth reading.
sentences.zh: 这本书值得一读。

sentences.en: Her advice is worth taking seriously.
sentences.zh: 她的建议值得认真采纳。

sentences.en: She speaks in a polite manner.
sentences.zh: 她说话的方式很有礼貌。

sentences.en: We should learn his manner of studying.
sentences.zh: 我们应该学习他的学习方式。

sentences.en: The box was empty when we opened it.
sentences.zh: 我们打开盒子时，里面是空的。

sentences.en: She felt empty after saying goodbye to her friends.
sentences.zh: 和朋友们道别后，她感到心里空落落的。

sentences.en: The basic concept is easy to understand.
sentences.zh: 这个基本概念很容易理解。

sentences.en: We need to learn basic skills first.
sentences.zh: 我们首先需要学习基本技能。

sentences.en: We exchange gifts during the holiday.
sentences.zh: 我们在假期交换礼物。

sentences.en: Could you exchange this shirt for a larger size?
sentences.zh: 你能把这件衬衫换成大一号的吗？

sentences.en: She went out of her way to help me when I was in trouble.
sentences.zh: 我遇到麻烦时，她特地伸出援手帮助我。

sentences.en: My neighbors often go out of their way to collect my mail when I'm away.
sentences.zh: 我外出时，邻居们经常特地帮我收邮件。

sentences.en: Our host tried to make us feel at home during the visit.
sentences.zh: 拜访期间，主人努力让我们感觉像在家里一样。

sentences.en: She always knows how to make guests feel at home with her warm smile.
sentences.zh: 她总能用温暖的笑容让客人感觉宾至如归。

sentences.en: A teenage girl is listening to music in her room.
sentences.zh: 一个十几岁的女孩正在她的房间里听音乐。

sentences.en: Teenage years are full of changes and new experiences.
sentences.zh: 青少年时期充满了变化和新的经历。

sentences.en: My granddaughter loves to read books.
sentences.zh: 我的孙女喜欢读书。

sentences.en: She is playing with her granddaughter in the park.
sentences.zh: 她正在公园里和她的孙女玩。

sentences.en: We should behave well in class.
sentences.zh: 我们应该在课堂上表现良好。

sentences.en: How does your pet behave when you come home?
sentences.zh: 当你回家时，你的宠物表现如何？

sentences.en: Everyone passed the exam except Tom.
sentences.zh: 除了汤姆，所有人都通过了考试。

sentences.en: I like all fruits except bananas.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢所有水果，除了香蕉。

sentences.en: I hurt my elbow when I fell down.
sentences.zh: 我摔倒时弄伤了肘部。

sentences.en: She rested her elbow on the table.
sentences.zh: 她把肘部搁在桌子上。

sentences.en: The sun gradually rises in the morning.
sentences.zh: 太阳在早晨逐渐升起。

sentences.en: She gradually improved her English skills.
sentences.zh: 她逐渐提高了自己的英语技能。

sentences.en: You will get used to the new school life soon.
sentences.zh: 你很快就会习惯新的学校生活。

sentences.en: She has got used to getting up early for work.
sentences.zh: 她已经习惯了早起上班。

sentences.en: My teacher gave me a useful suggestion.
sentences.zh: 我的老师给了我一个有用的建议。

sentences.en: Can you offer a suggestion for my project?
sentences.zh: 你能为我的项目提个建议吗？

sentences.en: I would rather read than watch TV.
sentences.zh: 我宁愿看书也不愿看电视。

sentences.en: She is rather tall for her age.
sentences.zh: 就她的年龄而言，她相当高。

sentences.en: I would rather stay at home than go out in the rain.
sentences.zh: 我宁愿待在家里也不愿冒雨出去。

sentences.en: She would rather read books than watch TV in her free time.
sentences.zh: 她空闲时间宁愿看书也不愿看电视。

sentences.en: I drive a car to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天开车去学校。

sentences.en: Can you drive me to the park?
sentences.zh: 你能开车送我去公园吗？

sentences.en: The loud noise from the construction site drives me crazy.
sentences.zh: 建筑工地的巨大噪音让我抓狂。

sentences.en: Her constant complaining really drives her friends crazy.
sentences.zh: 她不停地抱怨真的让她的朋友们受不了。

sentences.en: The more you study, the more knowledge you will gain.
sentences.zh: 你学习得越多，获得的知识就越多。

sentences.en: The harder you work, the better grades you will get.
sentences.zh: 你工作越努力，成绩就会越好。

sentences.en: I have been reading a lot lately.
sentences.zh: 我最近读了很多书。

sentences.en: She has been feeling tired lately.
sentences.zh: 她最近一直感觉很累。

sentences.en: I want to be friends with my new classmate.
sentences.zh: 我想和我的新同学成为朋友。

sentences.en: She has been friends with him for many years.
sentences.zh: 她和他已经是多年的朋友了。

sentences.en: Please don't leave out any important details in your report.
sentences.zh: 请不要在你的报告中遗漏任何重要细节。

sentences.en: Did you leave out the last paragraph when you copied the article?
sentences.zh: 你复制这篇文章的时候是不是漏掉了最后一段？

sentences.en: True friendship lasts forever.
sentences.zh: 真正的友谊永存。

sentences.en: We should cherish our friendship.
sentences.zh: 我们应该珍惜我们的友谊。

sentences.en: The king rules his kingdom wisely.
sentences.zh: 这位国王明智地统治着他的王国。

sentences.en: A king often wears a crown on his head.
sentences.zh: 国王通常头上戴着王冠。

sentences.en: The machine needs power to run.
sentences.zh: 这台机器需要电力才能运行。

sentences.en: He used his power to help others.
sentences.zh: 他用自己的权力帮助别人。

sentences.en: A prime number is a number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself.
sentences.zh: 质数是大于1的自然数，除了1和它本身外没有其他正因数。

sentences.en: Examples of prime numbers include 2, 3, 5, 7, and 11.
sentences.zh: 质数的例子包括2、3、5、7和11。

sentences.en: The minister will give a speech tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 部长明天将发表演讲。

sentences.en: She wants to become a minister when she grows up.
sentences.zh: 她长大后想成为一名部长。

sentences.en: The prime minister leads the government.
sentences.zh: 首相领导政府。

sentences.en: She met with the prime minister yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天会见了首相。

sentences.en: My uncle works as a banker in a big bank.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在一家大银行当银行家。

sentences.en: The banker helped the customer open a new account.
sentences.zh: 这位银行家帮助客户开了一个新账户。

sentences.en: She achieved fame as a singer at a young age.
sentences.zh: 她年轻时就作为歌手成名了。

sentences.en: His fame spread quickly after he won the competition.
sentences.zh: 他赢得比赛后，名气迅速传开了。

sentences.en: Her face turned pale when she heard the bad news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个坏消息时，她的脸变得苍白。

sentences.en: The walls were painted a pale blue color.
sentences.zh: 墙壁被漆成了淡蓝色。

sentences.en: The queen lives in a beautiful palace.
sentences.zh: 女王住在一座美丽的宫殿里。

sentences.en: She curtsied to the queen politely.
sentences.zh: 她礼貌地向女王行屈膝礼。

sentences.en: I need to call in sick today because I don't feel well.
sentences.zh: 我今天需要打电话请病假，因为我感觉不舒服。

sentences.en: Please call in and leave a message if you can't attend the meeting.
sentences.zh: 如果你不能参加会议，请打电话进来留言。

sentences.en: The doctor will examine the patient carefully.
sentences.zh: 医生会仔细检查病人。

sentences.en: You need to examine the details before making a decision.
sentences.zh: 做决定前你需要检查细节。

sentences.en: He can neither read nor write.
sentences.zh: 他既不会读也不会写。

sentences.en: I have never been to Paris, nor have I visited London.
sentences.zh: 我从未去过巴黎，也没去过伦敦。

sentences.en: Neither Tom nor Mary likes coffee.
sentences.zh: 汤姆和玛丽都不喜欢咖啡。

sentences.en: She can neither sing nor dance.
sentences.zh: 她既不会唱歌也不会跳舞。

sentences.en: The palace is a grand building where kings and queens live.
sentences.zh: 宫殿是国王和王后居住的宏伟建筑。

sentences.en: We visited the ancient palace during our trip to the capital.
sentences.zh: 我们在首都旅行时参观了那座古老的宫殿。

sentences.en: Wealth can bring opportunities but not always happiness.
sentences.zh: 财富能带来机会，但不总是带来幸福。

sentences.en: Many people work hard to create wealth for their families.
sentences.zh: 许多人努力工作为家人创造财富。

sentences.en: To start with, let's learn some basic English words.
sentences.zh: 首先，让我们学习一些基础英语单词。

sentences.en: To start with, I need to finish my homework.
sentences.zh: 首先，我需要完成我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: The sky is grey on a cloudy day.
sentences.zh: 阴天时天空是灰色的。

sentences.en: My cat has grey fur.
sentences.zh: 我的猫有灰色的毛。

sentences.en: A lemon is a yellow fruit with a sour taste.
sentences.zh: 柠檬是一种黄色的、有酸味的水果。

sentences.en: I like to add lemon to my water for flavor.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在水里加柠檬来调味。

zh: 使人不舒服的；令人不舒适的

sentences.en: Wearing tight shoes makes me feel uncomfortable.
sentences.zh: 穿紧鞋子让我感到不舒服。

sentences.en: The hard chair is uncomfortable to sit on for a long time.
sentences.zh: 这把硬椅子长时间坐着不舒服。

sentences.en: The weight of the apple is 100 grams.
sentences.zh: 这个苹果的重量是100克。

sentences.en: We use a scale to measure weight.
sentences.zh: 我们用秤来测量重量。

sentences.en: He hurt his shoulder while playing basketball.
sentences.zh: 他打篮球时伤到了肩膀。

sentences.en: She put her hand on his shoulder gently.
sentences.zh: 她轻轻地把手放在他的肩膀上。

sentences.en: My main goal is to learn English well.
sentences.zh: 我的主要目标是学好英语。

sentences.en: Setting a clear goal helps us work hard.
sentences.zh: 设定明确的目标有助于我们努力奋斗。

sentences.en: I don't want to let down my parents.
sentences.zh: 我不想让我的父母失望。

sentences.en: She felt let down when he didn't come.
sentences.zh: 当他没来时，她感到失望。

sentences.en: The coach is training the team.
sentences.zh: 教练正在训练球队。

sentences.en: Our coach gives us good advice.
sentences.zh: 我们的教练给了我们很好的建议。

sentences.en: He likes to kick the ball in the park.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在公园里踢球。

sentences.en: Don't kick the door; it might break.
sentences.zh: 不要踢门，它可能会坏。

sentences.en: The teacher had to kick him off the team because he broke the rules.
sentences.zh: 老师不得不把他从队里开除，因为他违反了规定。

sentences.en: If you keep being late, they might kick you off the project.
sentences.zh: 如果你继续迟到，他们可能会把你从这个项目中除名。

zh: 对某人苛刻；对某人要求严厉

sentences.en: Teachers should not be hard on students who make mistakes.
sentences.zh: 老师不应该对犯错的学生过于严厉。

sentences.en: She is always hard on herself when she fails an exam.
sentences.zh: 当考试不及格时，她总是对自己很苛刻。

sentences.en: I like apples; besides, I also enjoy bananas.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢苹果；此外，我也喜欢香蕉。

sentences.en: Besides studying, she often plays basketball after school.
sentences.zh: 除了学习，她放学后经常打篮球。

sentences.en: My teammate and I work together on the project.
sentences.zh: 我和我的队友一起做这个项目。

sentences.en: She is a good teammate because she always helps others.
sentences.zh: 她是个好队友，因为她总是帮助别人。

sentences.en: Courage helps us face challenges bravely.
sentences.zh: 勇气帮助我们勇敢面对挑战。

sentences.en: She showed great courage when solving the problem.
sentences.zh: 她在解决问题时表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.en: I prefer to read books rather than watch TV.
sentences.zh: 我宁愿看书也不愿看电视。

sentences.en: She decided to walk rather than take the bus.
sentences.zh: 她决定步行而不是坐公交车。

sentences.en: The guy is playing basketball in the park.
sentences.zh: 那个家伙正在公园里打篮球。

sentences.en: I saw a tall guy walking down the street yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天我看到一个高个子男人在街上走。

sentences.en: I need to pull the door open.
sentences.zh: 我需要把门拉开。

sentences.en: Can you help me pull this box?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我拉这个箱子吗？

sentences.en: We need to pull together to finish the project on time.
sentences.zh: 我们需要齐心协力按时完成项目。

sentences.en: During difficult times, families often pull together to support each other.
sentences.zh: 在困难时期，家人常常团结起来互相支持。

sentences.en: She sighed with relief when she heard the good news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个好消息时，她松了一口气。

sentences.en: The medicine brought some relief from his pain.
sentences.zh: 这种药减轻了他的一些痛苦。

sentences.en: She gave a nod to show she agreed.
sentences.zh: 她点头表示同意。

sentences.en: He gave a quick nod and walked away.
sentences.zh: 他快速点了点头然后走开了。
