sentences.en: We need to sign an agreement before starting the project.
sentences.zh: 在开始项目前，我们需要签署一份协议。

sentences.en: The two companies reached an agreement on the cooperation terms.
sentences.zh: 两家公司就合作条款达成了协议。

sentences.en: The mechanic found a fault in the engine.
sentences.zh: 机械师在发动机里发现了一个故障。

sentences.en: It's not your fault that the project failed.
sentences.zh: 项目失败不是你的错。

sentences.en: Her poor performance did disappoint her parents.
sentences.zh: 她糟糕的表现确实让她的父母失望了。

sentences.en: Don't be disappointed if you fail the first try.
sentences.zh: 如果你第一次尝试失败了，不要感到失望。

zh: 出乎意料的；始料不及的

sentences.en: The rain came unexpectedly, so we got wet.
sentences.zh: 雨下得很突然，所以我们淋湿了。

sentences.en: She received an unexpected gift from her friend.
sentences.zh: 她收到了朋友送的一份意想不到的礼物。

sentences.en: By the time I arrived, the party had already started.
sentences.zh: 当我到达时，派对已经开始了。

sentences.en: She will have finished her homework by the time her parents come back.
sentences.zh: 到她父母回来时，她将已经完成作业了。

sentences.en: I carry my books in a backpack.
sentences.zh: 我把书放在背包里。

sentences.en: She bought a new backpack for school.
sentences.zh: 她为上学买了一个新背包。

phrases.en: oversleep because of staying up late

sentences.en: I overslept this morning and was late for school.
sentences.zh: 我今天早上睡过头了，上学迟到了。

sentences.en: If you don't set an alarm, you might oversleep tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 如果你不设闹钟，明天可能会睡过头。

sentences.en: Could you give me a lift to the station?
sentences.zh: 你能让我搭便车去车站吗？

sentences.en: My neighbor often gives me a lift when it rains.
sentences.zh: 下雨的时候，我的邻居经常让我搭便车。

sentences.en: The children built a block tower in the classroom.
sentences.zh: 孩子们在教室里搭了一座积木塔。

sentences.en: Please put each block back in its correct place after playing.
sentences.zh: 玩耍后请把每块积木放回正确的位置。

sentences.en: Our plan is in line with the company's goals.
sentences.zh: 我们的计划与公司的目标一致。

sentences.en: Her actions are in line with her promises.
sentences.zh: 她的行动与她的承诺一致。

sentences.en: The worker is building a house.
sentences.zh: 这位工人正在建造房子。

sentences.en: My father is a worker in a factory.
sentences.zh: 我的爸爸是一家工厂的工人。

sentences.en: She likes to stare at the stars in the sky.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢凝视天空中的星星。

sentences.en: It's impolite to stare at people directly.
sentences.zh: 直接盯着人看是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: She stared at me in disbelief when I told her the news.
sentences.zh: 当我告诉她这个消息时，她难以置信地盯着我。

sentences.en: There was a look of disbelief on his face as he heard the story.
sentences.zh: 听到这个故事时，他脸上露出了难以置信的表情。

sentences.en: The bird is flying above the tree.
sentences.zh: 那只鸟正在树上方飞。

sentences.en: Please write your name above the line.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字写在线上方。

sentences.en: If you play with fire, you might burn your hand.
sentences.zh: 如果你玩火，可能会烧伤你的手。

sentences.en: Dry leaves burn easily when exposed to flame.
sentences.zh: 干树叶遇到火焰时很容易燃烧。

sentences.en: The fire is burning brightly in the fireplace.
sentences.zh: 壁炉里的火正熊熊燃烧。

sentences.en: She felt her cheeks burning after being praised.
sentences.zh: 受到表扬后，她感到脸颊发烫。

sentences.en: The doctor said the patient is alive.
sentences.zh: 医生说病人还活着。

sentences.en: We should cherish every moment we are alive.
sentences.zh: 我们应该珍惜活着的每一刻。

sentences.en: We need to go to the airport to catch our flight.
sentences.zh: 我们需要去机场赶飞机。

sentences.en: The airport is usually busy with many travelers.
sentences.zh: 机场通常有很多旅客，很繁忙。

sentences.en: We will wait till you arrive.
sentences.zh: 我们会等你到你到达为止。

sentences.en: He worked till midnight yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他昨天工作到午夜。

sentences.en: The sun sets in the west.
sentences.zh: 太阳从西边落下。

sentences.en: My house is to the west of the park.
sentences.zh: 我的房子在公园的西边。

sentences.en: I like to put cream in my coffee.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在咖啡里加奶油。

sentences.en: She used cream to make the cake soft.
sentences.zh: 她用奶油让蛋糕变得松软。

sentences.en: Monday to Friday are usually workdays.
sentences.zh: 周一到周五通常是工作日。

sentences.en: I go to the office on workdays.
sentences.zh: 我在工作日去办公室。

sentences.en: She always shows up on time for class.
sentences.zh: 她总是准时出现在课堂上。

sentences.en: Did you show up at the party last night?
sentences.zh: 你昨晚出现在派对上了吗？

sentences.en: A bean is a small seed that can be eaten or planted.
sentences.zh: 豆子是一种可以食用或种植的小种子。

sentences.en: I like to add beans to my soup for extra nutrition.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在汤里加豆子来增加营养。

sentences.en: We went to the market to buy fresh vegetables.
sentences.zh: 我们去市场买新鲜的蔬菜。

sentences.en: The market is usually crowded on weekends.
sentences.zh: 市场在周末通常很拥挤。

sentences.en: We need to finish the project by the end of this month.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在本月底之前完成这个项目。

sentences.en: She hopes to learn 500 new words by the end of the year.
sentences.zh: 她希望在年底之前学会500个新单词。

sentences.en: Don't call others a fool; it's impolite.
sentences.zh: 不要称别人为傻瓜，这是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: He felt like a fool after making that mistake.
sentences.zh: 犯了那个错误后，他觉得自己像个傻瓜。

sentences.en: She wore a beautiful costume to the Halloween party.
sentences.zh: 她穿着漂亮的服装去参加万圣节派对。

sentences.en: The actress changed her costume three times during the play.
sentences.zh: 这位女演员在剧中换了三次服装。

sentences.en: She felt embarrassed when she tripped in front of the class.
sentences.zh: 当她在全班面前绊倒时，她感到很尴尬。

sentences.en: He was embarrassed to admit that he had forgotten her name.
sentences.zh: 他不好意思承认自己忘了她的名字。

sentences.en: We are going to a costume party this weekend.
sentences.zh: 这个周末我们要去参加一个化妆派对。

sentences.en: She dressed up as a princess for the costume party.
sentences.zh: 她为化妆派对打扮成了一位公主。

sentences.en: The teacher will announce the exam results tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 老师明天将宣布考试结果。

sentences.en: We need to announce the meeting time to all participants.
sentences.zh: 我们需要向所有参与者宣布会议时间。

sentences.en: I like to eat spaghetti with tomato sauce.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃加番茄酱的意大利面。

sentences.en: Spaghetti is a type of long, thin pasta from Italy.
sentences.zh: 意大利面是一种来自意大利的细长面条。

sentences.en: The email claiming to offer free money was a hoax.
sentences.zh: 那封声称提供免费金钱的电子邮件是个骗局。

sentences.en: She realized the story about aliens landing was just a hoax.
sentences.zh: 她意识到关于外星人登陆的故事只是一个骗局。

sentences.en: The concert tickets sold out within an hour.
sentences.zh: 音乐会门票在一小时内售罄。

sentences.en: We need to restock the shelves because several items have sold out.
sentences.zh: 我们需要补充货架，因为有几样商品已经卖完了。

sentences.en: The scientist made an important discovery yesterday.
sentences.zh: 这位科学家昨天有了一项重要发现。

sentences.en: We learned about the discovery of electricity in class.
sentences.zh: 我们在课堂上学习了电的发现。

sentences.en: The lady is wearing a red dress.
sentences.zh: 这位女士穿着一条红色的连衣裙。

sentences.en: I saw a kind lady helping an old man cross the street.
sentences.zh: 我看到一位善良的女士帮助一位老人过马路。

sentences.en: I need to cancel my appointment.
sentences.zh: 我需要取消我的预约。

sentences.en: Please cancel the order for me.
sentences.zh: 请帮我取消订单。

sentences.en: The police officer helped the lost child find his way home.
sentences.zh: 这位警官帮助迷路的孩子找到了回家的路。

sentences.en: My uncle works as an officer in the army.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在军队里担任军官。

sentences.en: The story he told was so believable that everyone believed him.
sentences.zh: 他讲的故事如此可信，以至于每个人都相信了他。

sentences.en: A believable excuse should have some details to support it.
sentences.zh: 一个可信的借口应该有一些细节来支撑它。

sentences.en: The sun will disappear behind the clouds soon.
sentences.zh: 太阳很快就会消失在云层后面。

sentences.en: If you don't pay attention, the opportunity may disappear quickly.
sentences.zh: 如果你不注意，机会可能会很快消失。

sentences.en: Forgetting her lines in front of the class was an embarrassing moment for her.
sentences.zh: 在全班面前忘记台词对她来说是个尴尬的时刻。

sentences.en: He felt embarrassing when he realized he had worn mismatched socks to the meeting.
sentences.zh: 当他意识到自己穿着不成对的袜子去开会时，感到很尴尬。

sentences.en: Don't litter in the park.
sentences.zh: 不要在公园里乱扔垃圾。

sentences.en: We should pick up litter to keep the environment clean.
sentences.zh: 我们应该捡起垃圾来保持环境清洁。

sentences.en: The book is on the bottom shelf.
sentences.zh: 书在最底层的架子上。

sentences.en: The bottom of the cup is wet.
sentences.zh: 杯子的底部是湿的。

sentences.en: The fisherman catches fish in the river every morning.
sentences.zh: 这位渔民每天早上在河里捕鱼。

sentences.en: My grandfather used to be a skilled fisherman.
sentences.zh: 我的祖父曾经是一位熟练的渔民。

sentences.en: Coal is a black substance used as fuel.
sentences.zh: 煤是一种用作燃料的黑色物质。

sentences.en: We can burn coal to get heat.
sentences.zh: 我们可以燃烧煤来获取热量。

sentences.en: The old house looks ugly.
sentences.zh: 这座老房子看起来很丑。

sentences.en: She thinks the dress is ugly.
sentences.zh: 她觉得这条裙子很难看。

sentences.en: His speed is his main advantage in the race.
sentences.zh: 他的速度是他在比赛中的主要优势。

sentences.en: Learning English gives you an advantage in many jobs.
sentences.zh: 学习英语能让你在很多工作中具备优势。

sentences.en: The cost of the book is 20 dollars.
sentences.zh: 这本书的价格是20美元。

sentences.en: We need to consider the cost before making a decision.
sentences.zh: 做决定前我们需要考虑成本。

sentences.en: The old house has a wooden door.
sentences.zh: 这座老房子有一扇木门。

sentences.en: She made a small box with wooden sticks.
sentences.zh: 她用木棍做了一个小盒子。

sentences.en: Plastic is a common material used to make bottles and bags.
sentences.zh: 塑料是一种常用于制作瓶子和袋子的材料。

sentences.en: We should reduce plastic waste to protect the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们应该减少塑料垃圾以保护环境。

sentences.en: I often order takeaway when I'm busy.
sentences.zh: 我忙的时候经常点外卖。

sentences.en: Takeaway food is convenient for students.
sentences.zh: 外卖食品对学生来说很方便。

sentences.en: Put the trash into the bin.
sentences.zh: 把垃圾放进垃圾桶里。

sentences.en: The bin is full of waste paper.
sentences.zh: 这个垃圾桶装满了废纸。

sentences.en: A shark is a large fish with sharp teeth that lives in the ocean.
sentences.zh: 鲨鱼是一种生活在海洋里、长着锋利牙齿的大鱼。

sentences.en: We can see a shark swimming in the aquarium.
sentences.zh: 我们可以看到一条鲨鱼在水族馆里游来游去。

sentences.en: The word 'fin' refers to the flat part on a fish's body that helps it swim.
sentences.zh: 单词'fin'指的是鱼身体上帮助它游泳的扁平部分。

sentences.en: Sharks use their fins to balance and move through the water.
sentences.zh: 鲨鱼用它们的鳍来保持平衡并在水中移动。

sentences.en: It is cruel to hurt animals.
sentences.zh: 伤害动物是残忍的。

sentences.en: The cruel king treated his people badly.
sentences.zh: 那个残忍的国王对他的人民很不好。

sentences.en: Smoking is harmful to health.
sentences.zh: 吸烟对健康有害。

sentences.en: It's important to avoid harmful substances.
sentences.zh: 避免有害物质很重要。

sentences.en: Smoking can be harmful to your health.
sentences.zh: 吸烟可能对你的健康有害。

sentences.en: Too much sugar is harmful to teeth.
sentences.zh: 过多的糖对牙齿有害。

sentences.en: The flag is flying at the top of the mountain.
sentences.zh: 旗帜在山顶飘扬。

sentences.en: My name is written at the top of the paper.
sentences.zh: 我的名字写在纸的顶端。

sentences.en: A chain is a series of connected links.
sentences.zh: 链条是一系列相互连接的链环。

sentences.en: We can use a chain to lock the gate.
sentences.zh: 我们可以用链条锁门。

sentences.en: The food chain shows how energy passes from plants to animals.
sentences.zh: 食物链展示了能量如何从植物传递到动物。

sentences.en: In a simple food chain, grass is eaten by rabbits, and rabbits are eaten by foxes.
sentences.zh: 在简单的食物链中，草被兔子吃，兔子被狐狸吃。

sentences.en: The forest is a complex ecosystem with many plants and animals.
sentences.zh: 森林是一个有着许多动植物的复杂生态系统。

sentences.en: Protecting the ecosystem helps maintain the balance of nature.
sentences.zh: 保护生态系统有助于维持自然平衡。

sentences.en: The car manufacturing industry produces many vehicles every year.
sentences.zh: 汽车制造业每年生产许多车辆。

sentences.en: She wants to work in the technology industry after graduation.
sentences.zh: 她毕业后想在科技行业工作。

sentences.en: Law is a system of rules that people must follow.
sentences.zh: 法律是人们必须遵守的一套规则体系。

sentences.en: Studying law helps us understand our rights and responsibilities.
sentences.zh: 学习法律帮助我们了解自己的权利和义务。

sentences.en: We need scientific methods to solve this problem.
sentences.zh: 我们需要科学的方法来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: Her research is based on scientific evidence.
sentences.zh: 她的研究基于科学证据。

sentences.en: Many students want to take part in the school sports meeting.
sentences.zh: 许多学生想参加学校运动会。

sentences.en: Will you take part in the English speech competition next week?
sentences.zh: 你会参加下周的英语演讲比赛吗？

sentences.en: I can't afford a new car right now.
sentences.zh: 我现在买不起新车。

sentences.en: We need to afford the cost of education for our children.
sentences.zh: 我们需要负担孩子的教育费用。

sentences.en: Please turn off the light when you leave.
sentences.zh: 离开时请关灯。

sentences.en: Can you help me turn off the computer?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我关掉电脑吗？

zh: 可重复使用的；可再次使用的

sentences.en: We should use reusable bags instead of plastic ones to protect the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们应该使用可重复使用的袋子代替塑料袋来保护环境。

sentences.en: This water bottle is reusable, so you can fill it up many times.
sentences.zh: 这个水瓶是可重复使用的，所以你可以多次装满它。

sentences.en: I need to pay for my books.
sentences.zh: 我需要为我的书付款。

sentences.en: She will pay for the dinner tonight.
sentences.zh: 她今晚将支付晚餐费用。

sentences.en: We need to take action to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 我们需要采取行动来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: It's time to take action and make a change.
sentences.zh: 是时候采取行动并做出改变了。

sentences.en: Transportation helps people travel from one place to another.
sentences.zh: 交通帮助人们从一个地方去往另一个地方。

sentences.en: We can take buses, trains, or planes for transportation.
sentences.zh: 我们可以乘坐公共汽车、火车或飞机出行。

sentences.en: We should recycle plastic bottles to protect the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们应该回收塑料瓶来保护环境。

sentences.en: My family likes to recycle old newspapers and magazines.
sentences.zh: 我的家人喜欢回收旧报纸和杂志。

sentences.en: Please pass me a napkin.
sentences.zh: 请递给我一张餐巾纸。

sentences.en: I need a napkin to wipe my mouth.
sentences.zh: 我需要一张餐巾纸擦嘴。

sentences.en: Please throw away the trash after eating.
sentences.zh: 吃完东西后请把垃圾扔掉。

sentences.en: She decided to throw away the old clothes she no longer wore.
sentences.zh: 她决定扔掉那些不再穿的旧衣服。

sentences.en: We should put our free time to good use by reading books.
sentences.zh: 我们应该通过读书好好利用我们的空闲时间。

sentences.en: She put her artistic skills to good use when decorating the room.
sentences.zh: 她在装饰房间时充分发挥了自己的艺术才能。

sentences.en: Please pull down the window shade to block the sunlight.
sentences.zh: 请拉下窗帘来挡住阳光。

sentences.en: He had to pull down the old广告牌 because it was unsafe.
sentences.zh: 他不得不拆除那个旧广告牌，因为它不安全。

sentences.en: When you flip a cup upside down, the water will pour out.
sentences.zh: 当你把杯子倒过来时，水会流出来。

sentences.en: The picture was hanging upside down, so we couldn't see it clearly.
sentences.zh: 这幅画挂倒了，所以我们看不清楚。

sentences.en: We need to go through the gate to enter the park.
sentences.zh: 我们需要穿过大门才能进入公园。

sentences.en: The guard is standing at the gate to check visitors.
sentences.zh: 警卫站在大门口检查访客。

sentences.en: I need a bottle to hold water.
sentences.zh: 我需要一个瓶子来装水。

sentences.en: The bottle is made of glass.
sentences.zh: 这个瓶子是玻璃做的。

sentences.en: The president leads the country.
sentences.zh: 总统领导国家。

sentences.en: We elected a new president last year.
sentences.zh: 我们去年选举了一位新总统。

zh: 灵感；鼓舞人心的人（或事物）

sentences.en: Her story gave me a lot of inspiration.
sentences.zh: 她的故事给了我很多灵感。

sentences.en: Reading books is a good way to find inspiration.
sentences.zh: 读书是寻找灵感的好方法。

sentences.en: Iron is a strong metal used to make tools.
sentences.zh: 铁是一种用于制造工具的坚固金属。

sentences.en: We can find iron in many everyday objects like nails.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在许多日常物品如钉子中找到铁。

sentences.en: I go to work every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天去上班。

sentences.en: Work hard and you will succeed.
sentences.zh: 努力工作，你就会成功。

sentences.en: Metal is a hard material that can conduct electricity.
sentences.zh: 金属是一种能导电的坚硬材料。

sentences.en: We use metal to make many things like cars and coins.
sentences.zh: 我们用金属制造很多东西，比如汽车和硬币。

sentences.en: Can you bring back my book tomorrow?
sentences.zh: 你明天能把我的书带回来吗？

sentences.en: They decided to bring back the old tradition.
sentences.zh: 他们决定恢复这个古老的传统。

sentences.en: Creativity helps us think of new ideas and solve problems in smart ways.
sentences.zh: 创造力帮助我们想出新点子并以聪明的方式解决问题。

sentences.en: Drawing a picture or writing a story is a good way to show your creativity.
sentences.zh: 画画或写故事是展示你创造力的好方法。

sentences.en: We need to do a survey about students' hobbies.
sentences.zh: 我们需要做一个关于学生爱好的调查。

sentences.en: The survey results will help us understand the problem better.
sentences.zh: 调查结果将帮助我们更好地理解这个问题。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to follow the standard procedure.
sentences.zh: 老师要求我们遵循标准流程。

sentences.en: This product meets the international standard for safety.
sentences.zh: 该产品符合国际安全标准。

sentences.en: The boat is rowing on the lake.
sentences.zh: 小船正在湖上划行。

sentences.en: Can you row a boat?
sentences.zh: 你会划船吗？

sentences.en: She has won the competition three times in a row.
sentences.zh: 她连续三次赢得了比赛。

sentences.en: It has rained heavily for five days in a row.
sentences.zh: 已经连续五天大雨滂沱了。

sentences.en: I type on the keyboard.
sentences.zh: 我在键盘上打字。

sentences.en: The keyboard has many keys.
sentences.zh: 键盘有很多按键。

sentences.en: The scientist used a special method to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 这位科学家用一种特殊的方法解决了这个问题。

sentences.en: Learning a new method can improve your study efficiency.
sentences.zh: 学习一种新方法能提高你的学习效率。

sentences.en: Please follow the instructions carefully.
sentences.zh: 请仔细按照说明操作。

sentences.en: The teacher gave clear instructions for the assignment.
sentences.zh: 老师对作业给出了清晰的指示。

sentences.en: In math class, we often use double to represent decimal numbers like 3.14.
sentences.zh: 在数学课上，我们经常用 double 来表示像 3.14 这样的小数。

sentences.en: The variable 'price' is declared as double to store precise monetary values.
sentences.zh: 变量 'price' 被声明为 double 类型，以存储精确的货币值。

sentences.en: You shall finish your homework on time.
sentences.zh: 你应该按时完成作业。

sentences.en: We shall go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天要去公园。

sentences.en: We often look back at our childhood memories with a smile.
sentences.zh: 我们常常微笑着回顾童年记忆。

sentences.en: It's important to look back at past mistakes to learn and grow.
sentences.zh: 回顾过去的错误以学习和成长是很重要的。

sentences.en: She worked hard to overcome her fear of public speaking.
sentences.zh: 她努力克服对公开演讲的恐惧。

sentences.en: We can overcome any difficulty if we stay united.
sentences.zh: 如果我们团结一致，就能克服任何困难。

sentences.en: The children tend to make a mess when playing with toys.
sentences.zh: 孩子们玩玩具时往往会弄得一团糟。

sentences.en: Please clean up if you make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.zh: 如果你把厨房弄得一团糟，请打扫干净。

sentences.en: She will graduate from university next year.
sentences.zh: 她明年将从大学毕业。

sentences.en: After I graduate, I want to find a good job.
sentences.zh: 我毕业后想找一份好工作。

sentences.en: Even when he was criticized, he managed to keep his cool.
sentences.zh: 即使受到批评，他也努力保持冷静。

sentences.en: It's important to keep your cool during an emergency.
sentences.zh: 紧急情况下保持冷静很重要。

sentences.en: A caring mother always looks after her children.
sentences.zh: 一位有爱心的母亲总是照顾她的孩子。

sentences.en: Being caring means showing kindness to others.
sentences.zh: 有爱心意味着对他人表现出善意。

sentences.en: This book is ours.
sentences.zh: 这本书是我们的。

sentences.en: The toys on the shelf are ours.
sentences.zh: 架子上的玩具是我们的。

sentences.en: My senior brother helps me with my homework.
sentences.zh: 我的哥哥帮我辅导作业。

sentences.en: She is a senior student in high school.
sentences.zh: 她是一名高中高年级学生。

sentences.en: I am studying in senior high school now.
sentences.zh: 我现在正在高中学习。

sentences.en: Senior high school is an important stage for students to prepare for college.
sentences.zh: 高中是学生为大学做准备的重要阶段。

sentences.en: She received a text message from her friend.
sentences.zh: 她收到了朋友发来的短信。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to read the text aloud.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们大声朗读课文。

sentences.en: Time seems to go by quickly when I'm reading.
sentences.zh: 我看书的时候时间似乎过得很快。

sentences.en: Let's go by bus to the park this afternoon.
sentences.zh: 今天下午我们乘公交车去公园吧。

sentences.en: The mountain has different level paths for climbers.
sentences.zh: 这座山有不同难度级别的登山路径。

sentences.en: She studied hard to reach a higher level in math.
sentences.zh: 她努力学习以达到更高的数学水平。

sentences.en: She is pursuing a master's degree in biology.
sentences.zh: 她正在攻读生物学硕士学位。

sentences.en: To get this job, a bachelor's degree is usually required.
sentences.zh: 要获得这份工作，通常需要学士学位。

sentences.en: The manager is responsible for leading the team.
sentences.zh: 经理负责领导团队。

sentences.en: Our new manager has many years of experience.
sentences.zh: 我们的新经理有多年经验。

sentences.en: I believe in my dreams and work hard to achieve them.
sentences.zh: 我相信我的梦想，并努力去实现它们。

sentences.en: We should believe in ourselves even when facing difficulties.
sentences.zh: 即使面对困难，我们也应该相信自己。

sentences.en: A gentleman always opens the door for others.
sentences.zh: 绅士总是为别人开门。

sentences.en: He behaves like a true gentleman in public.
sentences.zh: 他在公共场合表现得像一位真正的绅士。

sentences.en: Her graduation ceremony will be held next month.
sentences.zh: 她的毕业典礼将于下个月举行。

sentences.en: We prepared a special gift for his graduation.
sentences.zh: 我们为他的毕业准备了一份特别的礼物。

sentences.en: We attended a graduation ceremony yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天参加了一场毕业典礼。

sentences.en: The opening ceremony of the Olympic Games was very grand.
sentences.zh: 奥运会的开幕式非常盛大。

sentences.en: First of all, we need to finish our homework.
sentences.zh: 首先，我们需要完成作业。

sentences.en: First of all, let's introduce ourselves.
sentences.zh: 首先，让我们做个自我介绍。

sentences.en: I want to congratulate you on your success.
sentences.zh: 我想祝贺你的成功。

sentences.en: We should congratulate her on winning the prize.
sentences.zh: 我们应该祝贺她赢得了奖品。

sentences.en: After playing basketball, I feel thirsty and want to drink water.
sentences.zh: 打完篮球后，我感到口渴，想喝水。

sentences.en: She always keeps a bottle of water nearby when she is thirsty.
sentences.zh: 她口渴的时候总是在身边放一瓶水。

sentences.en: She is thirsty for knowledge and reads every day.
sentences.zh: 她渴望知识，每天都读书。

sentences.en: Young people are often thirsty for new experiences.
sentences.zh: 年轻人常常渴望新的体验。

sentences.en: I am thankful for my family and friends.
sentences.zh: 我感谢我的家人和朋友。

sentences.en: She wrote a thankful letter to her teacher.
sentences.zh: 她给她的老师写了一封感谢信。

sentences.en: We should be thankful to our parents for their love and care.
sentences.zh: 我们应该感谢父母的爱与关怀。

sentences.en: She is thankful to her teacher for helping her solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 她感谢老师帮助她解决了这个问题。

sentences.en: Lastly, we need to clean the classroom before leaving.
sentences.zh: 最后，我们离开前需要打扫教室。

sentences.en: She finished her homework, and lastly, she read a storybook.
sentences.zh: 她完成了作业，最后，她读了一本故事书。

sentences.en: I need to finish my task.
sentences.zh: 我需要完成我的任务。

sentences.en: The teacher gave us a new task.
sentences.zh: 老师给了我们一个新任务。

sentences.en: We need to plan ahead for the trip.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为这次旅行提前计划。

sentences.en: She walked ahead of the group to lead the way.
sentences.zh: 她走在队伍前面带路。

sentences.en: We arrived ahead of schedule.
sentences.zh: 我们提前到达了。

sentences.en: She walked ahead of the group.
sentences.zh: 她走在队伍的前面。

sentences.en: She went to the park along with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她和她的朋友们一起去了公园。

sentences.en: Along with math, she also enjoys learning English.
sentences.zh: 除了数学，她也喜欢学习英语。

sentences.en: We should be responsible for our actions.
sentences.zh: 我们应该对自己的行为负责。

sentences.en: A responsible student always finishes homework on time.
sentences.zh: 一个负责任的学生总是按时完成作业。

sentences.en: Teachers are responsible for educating students.
sentences.zh: 教师负责教育学生。

sentences.en: You should be responsible for your own actions.
sentences.zh: 你应该对自己的行为负责。

sentences.en: We need to separate the red apples from the green ones.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把红苹果和绿苹果分开。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to separate into groups of four.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们分成四人一组。

sentences.en: We set out on our journey at dawn.
sentences.zh: 我们黎明时分出发去旅行。

sentences.en: She set out the dishes on the table carefully.
sentences.zh: 她小心地把盘子摆放在桌子上。

sentences.en: Please separate the red apples from the green ones.
sentences.zh: 请把红苹果和绿苹果分开。

sentences.en: We need to separate the living room from the dining area with a screen.
sentences.zh: 我们需要用屏风把客厅和餐厅区域隔开。

sentences.en: A bird uses its wings to fly.
sentences.zh: 鸟用翅膀飞翔。

sentences.en: The airplane's wing helps it stay in the air.
sentences.zh: 飞机的机翼帮助它在空中停留。
